26a5(khri brgyad): shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
26a6(khri brgyad): sa 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chu
26a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis byang chub kyi sems kyi mdug phyogs su dang m+b+ha bu'i ti nge 'dzin ma snyoms par zhugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob la/ de yang
26a8(khri brgyad): na gshegs pas myos dang lda/  'dags pa banyis / sa so pang dag pa sa pa banyid pa khyams pan dang/ skye chen po dag sapa tsha ma 'das pa
26b1(khri brgyad): ni 'a migs pa ga yang ma pa ste/ rab khyod byang chub sems dpa' thams dpa' chen po ldan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa
26b2(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa ni de lta bu ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin du yongs su dag pa'i tshig lnga po dag yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems
26b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pa mig lnga po de dag yongs su dag par byed pa ni go che chen po bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
26b4(khri brgyad): tsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang dag la gnas par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
26b5(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la yang gnas par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas dang / gnas pa po dang
26b6(khri brgyad): gnas par bya ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das par
26b7(khri brgyad): gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'chal ba ltar na/ btsun pa bcom ldan rengs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa
27a1(khri brgyad): gzugs pa gnas pa rnam brgya lags so// de bzhin du tshong ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed rnams dang // rnam par shes pa dag la gnas par mi
27a2(khri brgyad): / mig la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bkyi lags so// de bzhin du gzugs rnams la gnas pa
27a3(khri brgyad): kyi lags so// de bzhin du sgra dang / di dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/ yid kyi rnam
27a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi
27a5(khri brgyad): lags so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyim tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/ yid kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tsha ba'i bar la gnas par me bgyi zhing / sa khams la gnas
27a6(khri brgyad): bar mi bgyi/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bskye/ nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi
27a7(khri brgyad): ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/ rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi chags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / de
27a8(khri brgyad): tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byad rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas myong ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzugs pa
27b1(khri brgyad): lags pa gzugs kyi stong pa nyid las gud na rang gzugs ma mchis te/ ku zugs cad kyang stong pa nyid lags pa/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lags pa'i slad du ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan la
27b2(khri brgyad): dam grang ba das na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shesas kyi rol tu phyin pa la smod pas/ gzugs pa gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags
27b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang pags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
27b4(khri brgyad): las gud na yang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags pa/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na
27b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de bzhi
27b6(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi pha nas/ rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bkyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rga shi ma lags la/ rga shi'i
27b7(khri brgyad): sto pa nyid las gud na yang rga shi ma mchis te/ ma shi nyinyen kyang stong pa nyid lagasal/ stong pa nyid kyang na shi legs pa'i slad du ste/  btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs das na byang chub sem
27b8(khri brgyad): dad sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol phyi pa la spyod pa ja ma na'i thang la gnam par che kyi lag pa so// rdzun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhas yang byang chub mams dpa' sem pa dang
28a1(khri brgyad): na kyil la tu phyinapa spyod pag/ dra pa 'ar ba nag pa zhal gnas pang mi bkyilags so// de ci'i slad du den/ 'ad sbyar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
28a2(khri brgyad): ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mam
28a3(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
28a4(khri brgyad): co brgyad kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas
28a5(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/ sbyong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
28a6(khri brgyad): cho brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lags pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems da
28a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco 'argyad la gnas par mi 'gyi lags so// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
28a8(khri brgyad): pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnan yang bdu ba sems dpa' sems pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
28b1(khri brgyad): gyi gas/ de bzhin du rgyal khrims kyi pha rab tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi la tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan kya pha ral tu phyin pa dang / shas
28b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
28b3(khri brgyad): zung na stong pa nyid ma mchis pa/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi
28b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
28b5(khri brgyad): gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
28b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ yig 'bru rnams la gnas par mi bgyi/ yi ge bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi Sha gcig brjod pa dang / gnyis brjod pa dang / mang po brjod pa'i bar dag la gan
28b7(khri brgyad): bar mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i skad du zhe na/ 'di ltar yig 'bru rnams ni yig po bru rnams kyis stong pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ le'u gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi
28b8(khri brgyad): tsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad
29a1(khri brgyad): nan/ 'das baban pa gas pa rnams namangon par shes pa rnams kyis byung / mngon pa shes pa ga sngags pa nini stong pa nyid ma lags/ stong pa nyid gang lags ca/ 
29a2(khri brgyad): de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags shing / mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis te/ mngon
29a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams lags pa'i slad du ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
29a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29a5(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi 'gyi lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi
29a6(khri brgyad): dag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi logs so// de tsa'i srad du zhe na/ 'di sa gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs me rtag pa nyid kyis stong // gzugs mi rtog pa nyid gang lags pa de stong bzhed pa
29a7(khri brgyad): lags/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid
29a8(khri brgyad): mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs me rtag pa nyid legs pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du char ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
29b1(khri brgyad): gas pad d+ha / ldan pa ma ldan pa nam zas pa sa da mas tshan pa gas ra ma ta ldan pa la spyad pas/ ka pa'i/ 
29b2(khri brgyad): ga zhid nas rnam pa gas pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi ba sa gnas par mi bkyi lags so// de bzhin du sa tagazugs nas rnam par zhes pa'i ba ma pa degs pa kyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags // garba
29b3(khri brgyad): des rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la stong zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam pa
29b4(khri brgyad): zhes pa'i bar la mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la smon pa ma mchi ba shes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs
29b5(khri brgyad): dpa rnam par shes pa'i bar la gi zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes
29b6(khri brgyad): pa'i ba la kun nas nyon mongs shes bgyi bar gnas par me bkyi lags te// gnags nas rnam par shes pa'i ba zlas pam mchis shes brtsi bar gnas par ma bkyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par
29b7(khri brgyad): shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa ma mchis shes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so// 
29b8(khri brgyad): zhe na/ gzugs kyi phung por ji sad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slang du'o// 'dun pa sa ma ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes sa kyi
30a1(khri brgyad): pa/ chos kyang nad la gnas par ma 'argya lags so// de ci'i slad du ce na/ 'di ltar chos kyang 'azhid nyid na rgyas kyang bzhin nyid kyis sbyang ste/ chos kyi mnan nyid las lung na
30a2(khri brgyad): yang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/ stong pa nyid pas gung na yang chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// 
30a3(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin du
30a4(khri brgyad): sar te/ chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / tsha ba smon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar bar
30a5(khri brgyad): klad du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
30a6(khri brgyad): thams cad la gnas par mi bkyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste
30a7(khri brgyad): ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar ba// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pad
30a8(khri brgyad): bdag gir 'dzin par gror pa'i yid kyis gzugs la spyod cing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam pa dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ de lta ni gzugs mngon par
30b1(khri brgyad): bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing / de bzhin du char ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du shes mngon par radu 'gyid pa dang / 'du bye mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon pa du
30b2(khri brgyad): bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te/ mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te/ 
30b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes
30b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis de gzugs la spyod cing / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes pa
30b5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ de lta na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing / de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du babyed pa dang / 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa/ 
30b6(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lagapa la/ mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzi
30b7(khri brgyad): ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar
30b8(khri brgyad): 'byur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la me mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'i
31a1(khri brgyad): na pa gas kyid pa la spyad pa ni shes rab kyi yo phyin pa yangasas dzin pa lags/ kyi yos phyin pal nasas kyang dub kyid pa/ shes mi kyi mams can/ 
31a2(khri brgyad): pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis/ de bzhin du
31a3(khri brgyad): tong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// gzugs kyi bzung ba ma mchis pa/ de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
31a4(khri brgyad): srang du gzugs ma lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang / 'du shes gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bcu
31a5(khri brgyad): bcas pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du rnam par shes pa ma sngags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni yangs su
31a6(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du// gzungs
31a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra rnams ma lags po// shas ram kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// byang chub
31b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' can pa shes rab kyi parabatu phyin pa la de ltar skad pas/ tsham thams cad rang bzhin gyis snang bar na bar brtag par brgya hU~M/ canas kya ces gangs
31b2(khri brgyad): yang yid rnam par rga bar ma 'gyur ba de ltar nye bar btag par bab ste/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen za longs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'den gyi dkyil 'khor rtse lo byed/ 
31b3(khri brgyad): yang ba ba/ tshad ma mchis pa tshad ma nges pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / phye stong
31b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi skad du dang / de bzhin du byi nang stong banyid kyi slad du dang / snang ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / zin pa snang ba nyid dang / don dam pa stong ba nyid dang / 'du' byas stong ba nyid dang / 
31b5(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'dab pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / ra
31b6(khri brgyad): banyi dang /  byung ba bad dang /  zugs pa snang pa dang / das pa sad pa med pa da dang /  da tu 'a dag/ das nyid byung
31b7(khri brgyad): kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mas bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa
31b8(khri brgyad): lags pa'i spyad du'o// mtshan ma yang gang lags nan/ 'di sa sa gzugs ni mtshan ma lags sa// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg byed de/ tsas ni mtshan mi lags so// de bzhin du gyur // 
32a1(khri brgyad): deni gnang ba masam/ gabs pa mi bkyi lags so// de lta ma lags na ni gan du chub po gangs kyang rnams cad mkhyen pal tsha shes 'dis dad par mi 'gyur lags so// dang
32a2(khri brgyad): na/  swA pa rnam mad ches pa dang /  pa dang na ba dang sams pa dang 'dul pa nga byu pa // dasangamachen ma thul mas/ 
32a3(khri brgyad): des namatshan pa dganang yang mi bkyilags so// ngan rgyu ba ba sa kyang thos nas dang pas ngas bu'abra shi rang bzhin gyi ba rlung ba nyid du gas pa mthugs nas/ gsags
32a4(khri brgyad): ma bzung / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan mar yongs pu ma bzung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de la rang gi mtshan
32a5(khri brgyad): ba'i sa rnams sa yongs su sun mi 'i'i skad du/ 'i slad dunan/ 'ang kyang dag shes pa den gi mngon par rtags pa ze bas yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong
32a6(khri brgyad): ngon par rtogs pa thob pa dang / phyi nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/ nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de shes pa dang / mngon par rtogs/ 
32a7(khri brgyad): las gagan du yang dag pa sa su mi mthong ba da // kyi wang dugan/ mam padas gang gis shes pa sa byed pa dang / gas na mi tshang ba gang nas par
32b1(khri brgyad): bde gzugs nas rnam par shes par bar me rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs na pa rnam pa shes pa'i bar gyi nang dang / phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mtha
32b2(khri brgyad): gzugs las gzhan du shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la ba gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las
32b3(khri brgyad): gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// nam grangs 'di la kun du chub po sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de chos 'dil mos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dad las rjes su 'brang bar
32b4(khri brgyad): ra to// de lta bas na chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos nyid tshad ma ba gyis nas/ mtshan ma yid la mi bgyid pas ci nas kyang des chos gang yang yongs su bzung ba ma 'chis pa de ltar lo
32b5(khri brgyad): lags so// chos thams cad yangs su gzung ba la mchis pa'i srad du dam gang gzung b.rab kyi ba'am/ gtang ba mtshas gang yang mi dmigs pa/ chos thams cad rnam sems mamachi
32b6(khri brgyad): slad du/ de mya ngan las 'das kyang rlom sems su mi bayid lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongs su ma
32b7(khri brgyad): da na du tshong ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yangs su ma mtshan pa dang / de bzhin du sbya / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba la mchis pa
33a1(khri brgyad): srad du gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni/ pha rol nas pha rol tu mcheb ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi
33a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'dis kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid lags so// de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
33a3(khri brgyad): 'acu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye
33a4(khri brgyad): bar bzhag pa de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ma lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sangs rgyas kyi chos
33a5(khri brgyad): rarlabs ma lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i slad du ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes/ 
33a6(khri brgyad): / 'a byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs pa ma 'dzin pa nas de na pa skar te/ mas chen rnams cad dang / t-i ban gyi thamams cad kyibar du yangs su mi 'angon pa dang / 
33a7(khri brgyad): na pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
33a8(khri brgyad): 'ad yongs su ma batshan pamags sa kyim sa byed pa lags sa// mun pa bcom ldan padapa gan yang bya chub mas dpa'i sems dpa chen pogs sa kyi pa la tu byed
33b1(khri brgyad): ska pa na / pa ma sbyin pa 'di gag ni nas rab tu ldan pa / 'dag ga na
33b2(khri brgyad): 'dun cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pazlab brtag par 'gyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa na yang 'di snyam du chos gang yang mad cing / 
33b3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o snyam du nges par sems par bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
33b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor chos med cing mi dmigs pa gang yin/ smras pa/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chen po
33b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thogs
33b6(khri brgyad): pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi zhing dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi
33b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
33b8(khri brgyad): sarab kyi rab tu phyin pa'i chos ni med cing mi dmigs so// da bzhin du gyur te/ bsam gtan gyis ma sa ldan pa'i chos dang / 'jon 'grus kyang chab tu phyin pa'i chos dang / rtsong
34a1(khri brgyad): pa shA ra dwa ta ma rung bzhin du bzad par pha ral tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyang rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos na med cing sa dmigs sa/ dang ldan/ 
34a2(khri brgyad): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i// 
34a3(khri brgyad): rwa de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ro dwa ti'i zla nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// 
34a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs
34a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyang te/ 'phags pa lalam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin pa gags pa'i skabs btsun sa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs / 
34a6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa drug med cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos rnabs kyi chos nyid dang / chos kun/ 
34a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so// rgyun du zhugs pa med cing mi dmigs pa nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so// 
34a8(khri brgyad): sa rgyas me mi dmigs pa// bya chub semam da' me ci ming rigasas// mad na pi shA rA d+ha'i bu sangs rgyas shes byas med kyi med rtsig pa sa/ yo ldan pa na / 
34b1(khri brgyad): napa pa thams cadapa kyid panyid kyang ma rgya dmyigs pa// shA ra ti shu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon parabakyi pa ra tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ deltar nye bar rtog pa byed ce
34b2(khri brgyad): nges par sems par byed la/ de ltar nye bar rtog par byed cing / da ltar ngas par sems pa na/ gal te sems mi zhum mi 'god la mi skrag mi dang shing dang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'
34b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas tshadang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab
34b4(khri brgyad): 'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA
34b5(khri brgyad): ra dwa ti'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
34b6(khri brgyad): la skyed par/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ini rnam par shes pa'i ra
34b7(khri brgyad): lo ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa de lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khri
34b8(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang / gi rab pha sa tu phyir pa ni shes rab kyis po
35a1(khri brgyad): byad nga rang bzhin dang tha ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag par lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas
35a2(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i' bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
35a3(khri brgyad): da phyin pa la spyod pa na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra d+ya ti'i bu rgyu des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma
35a4(khri brgyad): bral bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin
35a5(khri brgyad): rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag pa'i mtha
35a6(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi
35a7(khri brgyad): sprin ni dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi
35a8(khri brgyad): bzhin na dngas po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan paM shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar rig par bya sre/ ji lta ba gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba de bzhin du tshor ba dag / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
35b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa na rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' bar ni yang dag pa'i mapa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ mtshan nyid kyang ra
35b2(khri brgyad): bzhin dang bral ba yin la/ rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid dang bral bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces sgrub pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan parab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 
35b3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
35b4(khri brgyad): ti'i 'de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'dis slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
35b5(khri brgyad): de ci'i b+him+ba zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par 'byung
35b6(khri brgyad): ded nga yin/ smras pa/ ci dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i cug zugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la ni skyes pa yang med cing byung ba yang dmigs su med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du sheb dang / 'du byed na
35b7(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la ni skyes pa yang med cing byung ba yang dmigs su med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag pa'i mthale bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang
35b8(khri brgyad): 'azhin gyis stong ste/ dal ni skyes pa yang med cing byung ba yang dmigs su med do// shes rab kyi sa rol tu phyin pa khri ba las ma gnas 'chile'u zhes bya ba/ bcu gcig pa'o// de na
36a1(khri brgyad): btsam ldan 'das la/ cho dang ldan par ba 'thar gyis 'ang skad ces gcol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra kyi
36a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
36a3(khri brgyad): ba la spyad na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// yang gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 
36a4(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtag ceg bgyib 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te gzugs la bde zhes
36a5(khri brgyad): ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhe bgyi ba'am/ 
36a6(khri brgyad): sdug bsdu la zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la bdag mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyad na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa
36a7(khri brgyad): legs so// de bzhin du gal te tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par das pa la bdag ma mchis shes bgyi 'a'am/ bdag ma mchis zhes bkye bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyad
36a8(khri brgyad): / 9te gzugs la stong zhes bkyi ba'am/ mi sto nas gyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan mal smod pa lags pad 'azhin du gas te tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa/ 
36b1(khri brgyad): sto zhes bgyi 'a'am/ me snang sheb bgyi bar spyod na don mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la mtshan ma mchis shes pagyi ba 'am/ mtshan ma ma mchis shes brtsa par spyod na de ni mtshan ma la
36b2(khri brgyad): dod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma mchis shes bgyi ba 'am/ tshan ma ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma
36b3(khri brgyad): spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la smon pa mchis shes bgyi ba 'am/ smon pa ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes da
36b4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa mchis shes bgyi ba 'am/ smon pa ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la ni zhes bgyi sa 'am/ ma zhi zhes
36b5(khri brgyad): gyi bar spyod/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ da
36b6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
36b7(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dpan zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la kun nas nyon mongs shes bgyi ba 'am/ rnam
36b8(khri brgyad): papar byang zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du phal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par zhes pa 'ang kun nas nyon mongs shes bgyi ba 'am/ 
37a1(khri brgyad): rnam par byang zhes bkye bar spyad na/ da ni mtshan pa la spyod pa lags so// dal te gzugs la skye zhes bkyi ba 'am/ mi skye zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa
37a2(khri brgyad): sa so// de bzhin dugal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye zhes paky-i pa'ag/ mi skye zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so/ 
37a3(khri brgyad): la te gzugs la 'dag ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'gag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
37a4(khri brgyad): pashes pa la 'gag ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'gag ces bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te gzugs la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ dngos po ma ma
37a5(khri brgyad): sa bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/ dngos
37a6(khri brgyad): ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldad 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod
37a7(khri brgyad): / thabs la mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag po rnams la spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du ster te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag bachad pa'i bar la
37a8(khri brgyad): dematshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
37b1(khri brgyad): cad kyi bar la spyad na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyad pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di snyam du
37b2(khri brgyad): bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ de bsgom par bya'o snyam ne/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni phyi
37b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'o snyam na/ de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o snyam na/ de ni ma
37b4(khri brgyad): spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas pa lags par rig par bgyi lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
37b5(khri brgyad): ridi skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ de bzhin du tshong ba
37b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos la/ de gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra
37b7(khri brgyad): sa dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos par byed pa na/ gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
37b8(khri brgyad): ngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa nas rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i bar la spyod na de ni tshe rabs phye ma la skye ba las yongs pa
38a1(khri brgyad): bar ning / de ni gab nas 'khrug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mthar pa 'jo ba nA~M.oM/ g+ha k+Sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes pa kyi
38a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa na thabs la mi mkhas pas mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mngon par zhen la ma
38a3(khri brgyad): par byed na/ de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o// de bzhin du gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos par byed pa nas de bzhin
38a4(khri brgyad): gal te chos kyi bar la gnas shing kun du shes te mos par byed na/ de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar par kho bo smra'o// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg par
38a5(khri brgyad): rkyen gyi ba tshor ba'i bar dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas shing kun du shes te mos par byed na// de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su
38a6(khri brgyad): bo d+ha'o// gal te dran pa nye'ang bzhag pa rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i bar dang / de bzhin ga
38a7(khri brgyad): maspobs bcunas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcob rgyad kyi 'arol gnas shing kun tu shes tems par byed de/ na tsha rabs phyem la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su me thar ba
38a8(khri brgyad): 'o// de na rten thos kyi ma 'as/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yang mngon ngas du bya ba skal pa yang medan// blan med pa lang dag par rdzogs pa'i kyang rgyab mngon par rdzogs par 'cha rgya
38b1(khri brgyad): kya tsa shes te// de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa la da ltar spyod na/ thabs ma ma mkhas pa dang ldan dang / thabs la
38b2(khri brgyad): mkhas par rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sem
38b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thabs la mkhas par rig par bya de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
38b4(khri brgyad): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs pa pi spod/ tshor ba dang
38b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma
38b6(khri brgyad): gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ me rtag ces/ 
38b7(khri brgyad): byabar mi spyod/ gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ ldag
38b8(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mi stong/ gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba
39a1(khri brgyad): 'a/ bdag med ces bya ra mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba ma/ mi stong nas bya bar mi skyed/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rlum
39a2(khri brgyad): shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
39a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin
39a4(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
39a5(khri brgyad): rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin
39a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba'am/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs kun nas nyon mongs shes bya ba'am/ rnam par byung
39a7(khri brgyad): byabar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs shes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs skye zhes bya
39a8(khri brgyad): 'am/ oM skye zhes bya bar ma spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am/ me skye zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzug sa 'gag ces bri ba 'am/ 
39b1(khri brgyad): 'gag ces bya bar ma spyad/ de banan du char ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byad rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag ces bya ba 'am/ ma 'gag cas bya bar ma spyad/ gzugs dngas pa yang cas
39b2(khri brgyad): ma/ dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod pa ste/ tshed
39b3(khri brgyad): na pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ mabs la mkhang pang rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr
39b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid las gud da yang gzugs med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid
39b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes
39b6(khri brgyad): bud na yang stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin la/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin
39b7(khri brgyad): swAr te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/ stong
39b8(khri brgyad): las gud na yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med de/ dran pa nye ba bzhag pa rnangs spong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang drad pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam pa yin no// de'i nen du sbyar te/ 
40a1(khri brgyad): nga'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud nas
40a2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med de/ 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
40a3(khri brgyad): ma yan lag brgyad pa yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la pa kud na
40a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid med stong pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa re
40a5(khri brgyad): su yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi
40a6(khri brgyad): pa 'dres pa bco brgyad las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid las lud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang
40a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40a8(khri brgyad): pa la smod pa da spyod do zhes bya ba pa'as mi med/ mi spyod do// zhes bya ba pa 'am mi men/ spyod kya spyod pa/ ma rjod ma mdzod ces khyam pa las 'i leg spyod pa yang ma yin pa spyod pa yang ma yid nas
40b1(khri brgyad): ra zab dan/ byang chub sems dpa'adi// ba zhes du kyi rom tu phyin par spyod pa ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i skal pa dang
40b2(khri brgyad): yin no// dad kyis smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti re 'us/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'did ces smras so// tshe dang ldan par ba byur 'i zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
40b3(khri brgyad): sbyin pa spyod par 'ab pa du las sa men/ smras te/ tshed nga ldan pa shA ra d+naSh+Ta di d+har shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ngog nyid dmigs su med do// ci'i phyir na/ 2
40b4(khri brgyad): ltar des rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpanga' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40b5(khri brgyad): la ston pa ma khas mi 'an to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta 'ur yang khas mi khyen to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams
40b6(khri brgyad): dngos pa med pa ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / bzung ba med pa'i phyir te/ bde de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ chos thams cad nye bar len pa/ 
40b7(khri brgyad): med pa rgya che ba'i yo byad tshad med par gtogs pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
40b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la khrib bam po bcu
41a1(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byar byang chub sems dpa' sems
41a2(khri brgyad): dang chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di khon dang mi bral zhing ldan pa/ myurd du blan med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang \u0f7f'am/ na te ting nge 'dzin gan
41a3(khri brgyad): gis kyang 'tshang rgya/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
41a4(khri brgyad): kAr du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching chu'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas na/ byang chub sems
41a5(khri brgyad): par sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
41a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa na ngornams so ri myangon du par bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la gnas na byung rgyu ba sems dpya' sems dpa'i chen po myur du blan mi pa yang dag phyir rdzogs pa'i bye/ 
41a7(khri brgyad): rgyab mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// se de rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba bzang
41a8(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba'i chal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug
41b1(khri brgyad): mi mthong ba zhes bya bar ti dang 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pags bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tog ces bya/ 
41b2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
41b3(khri brgyad): don dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa
41b4(khri brgyad): la gdon ma za bar 'dug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la 'jug cing phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba
41b5(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa
41b6(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil lokhor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rkun
41b7(khri brgyad): song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sing+ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chen chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par
41b8(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa tshal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rte pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag sems pa med la zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i
42a1(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od
42a2(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcis
42a3(khri brgyad): yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
42a4(khri brgyad): teme'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mchog
42a5(khri brgyad): 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab
42a6(khri brgyad): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i
42a7(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis gnon pa'i spyi gtsug ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'bor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed pa
42a8(khri brgyad): riting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting / 
42b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'angan dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyad pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
42b2(khri brgyad): gso med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yu ba las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs du gyur ba zhipa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sem pa med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
42b3(khri brgyad): dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / skabs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes
42b4(khri brgyad): 'ating nge 'dzin dang / thams cad las 'ad ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin du lhags pa med 'azhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dem thur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa
42b5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgyud bya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa
42b6(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sred pa'i 'dam bu thams cad phung po med par rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'adz+ra dang sbrul 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi
42b7(khri brgyad): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam
42b8(khri brgyad): thams cad dkyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa zad mi shes pa zhis bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da
43a1(khri brgyad): na gau nas na na na khams da pa dug pa la zhes bya rbu ts+tsha lkugs pa 'dug gisan pa 'dzin
43a2(khri brgyad): 'galnga pa dang 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /  snying po dang ldam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dung rta zla ba nya pa'i 'od srem med pa zhes bya ba'i
43a3(khri brgyad): de 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang mating nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
43a4(khri brgyad): cici rdul dang bral ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med
43a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa med la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyi la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon+do yang dag par me pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
43a6(khri brgyad): skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med la 'gro ba las rnam par grol ni gos pa med 'a zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ tshe dang
43a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ti nge 'don gang dag la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
43a8(khri brgyad): 'jur 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni ni dag yin no// de na mchod 'dzin pa rab 'byor cig/ tshong rdzun pa shAr dwa te'i dzu pa 'di skad ce ba smras so// al sa de
43b1(khri brgyad): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pa gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dbul gnas pa den ldan gyi de nan gshegs pa dgra brtsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na
43b2(khri brgyad): yang du nga ngogs pa'i byang chub tu phung bstan pa yin pa/ dkar phyogs bcu'i rigarten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi byes snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dugra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
43b3(khri brgyad): dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la lung sten pa rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mtho
43b4(khri brgyad): nga chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni snyoms par ma thugs pa dag go// bdag ni snyoms par zhugs pa'o// snyoms par 'jug go// snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro snyam du ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rlo
43b5(khri brgyad): sems su yang mi byed la/ rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad de la med cing mi 'gyung ngo // de nad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan la shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 
43b6(khri brgyad): dpa sa 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dpa/ brgan phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten A bamrak+Sha kAng gA'i kya
43b7(khri brgyad): ma snyed dgran/ de nin kA shegs pa kang dga'atsho zhing 'azhugs pa dag gis sung bstan pa reg par tha'am/ smras pa/ mang ldan sh+tsa d+hiti'i bu ma yin do//  ng+ge phyir zhe na/ 
43b8(khri brgyad): dA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan zhing / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzhan ma yin gyi/ byang chub
44a1(khri brgyad): na na'adzin da kya b+h+ya chub sems dpa' minate/ na pamams pa na du sa ba ro du phyin pa'adun gnas / 
44a2(khri brgyad): riganyi su byed med pa'i sbyin no// smras pa/ man ldan yang rtsonag yo nyi dzin kyang gzhanas/ byang chub macan pang bang gzhan pa'i me ting 'dzinan kyang byang chub sems dpa yin/ 
44a3(khri brgyad): mas pa 'did kyang ting nge dzin yin pa/ ting 'dzin dang/ byang chub sems dpang gang yin pa de gnyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na ni/ de m+b+ha na ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad mnyam
44a4(khri brgyad): rje spring / ban du shes 'amed par yang gyur mo//  lda pa te'i bunam grang ba'i nyid kyis na kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ti dzin sa chos thams dam sa
44a5(khri brgyad): de de mi shes shing / kun du shes pa yang med do// de rje'i phyir nen/ smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa 'di dag / cimi 'dzin de dang / gle par ba skye ba ro tu sbyin pa de med shin gyi mi zhes shing ldan du
44a6(khri brgyad): shes pa yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la lems po zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor mo legs so// khyod kyi tshiga'idi ni legs par smras so// 'di
44a7(khri brgyad): khyo das nyan pos zhon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mcho du bsten se su mo gang 'di ni khyod kyi tshul dang 'thum pa yin / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
44a8(khri brgyad): sta sheb rab chi sa rol tu phyin pas bslal par bya/ bsam gtan gyi 'arog gyin radas lan 'as kyi ro rkyen lad / 'bod pa rog phyin pa rab rgyas
44b1(khri brgyad): ni /  tu byen dam 'grob 'a bya'o// dbanan du ngan byung banag ma pa pa ltar bsrul byar gyu pa/ 'chags pa'alam yan lag brgyad pa'i ba dang / da na
44b2(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du bya ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dren pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la de snang bsra bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di//  rjes
44b3(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi sa ro tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti
44b4(khri brgyad): bsems dpa' sems pa 'a chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sloba' yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du na pa'i pha rob tu phyin pa'i bang la slob pa yi
44b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar slob na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi bar la rlob pa yin pa nas/ de ltar slob na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa co ca kyi la slob pa yin te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
44b6(khri brgyad): slob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pA bA ra dwa ti'i dus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha ro
44b7(khri brgyad): pa la slob pa lags shing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bga' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na
44b8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin to// gsol pa/ ma btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nig mi dmigs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ga' stsal pa/ shin du rnam par da
45a1(khri brgyad): byed bdag med migs sems can med migs pa nas/ shes pa pa dang / par par du ma dmigs so// de bzhin du gan du rnam par dag par bye phung brnams mi dmigs/ mas
45a2(khri brgyad): segs ma med migs sa/  pa 'i /  ga shin shin sum pa dag
45a3(khri brgyad): dmigs/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs/ gzugs so
45a4(khri brgyad): me dmigs so// de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa nas/ 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi dmigs so// de bzhin du shin du rnam par
45a5(khri brgyad): de phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdebs brda mi dmigs pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyi dmigs so// 
45a6(khri brgyad): rnam dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir me 'ong ba dang / dpa bcom pa mid dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag
45a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
45a8(khri brgyad): tshedang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa de gang lags/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / de zhin
45b1(khri brgyad): 'ag pa yod pa du/ banan na maungs pa medag dang / rnam med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su ma kha dang / chos thams cad mngon pa du byed pa med pa den rnam par dag pa yan na/ ga/ 
45b2(khri brgyad): ba/ btsud pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa na chos gang dag la bslabs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
45b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po dkar slob pa na chos gang dag la yang bslabs pa med do// deci'i phyim zhe na/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo'i dedag mngon par zhen pa dgra bcos 'di dag med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// 
45b4(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos 'di dag ji ltar byis pa so sor skye bo 'di dag mngon par zhen pa de ltar ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar med
45b5(khri brgyad): bas ma rig pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de dag mchis pa ma stsags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi
45b6(khri brgyad): radang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar sti phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / dra
45b7(khri brgyad): mas dang / rnam par shes pa med do// de bzhin dunang srong bzhid kyi phyi dang / dngos po med pa'i jo bo gidi stong pa zhid kyi bar rtse gyi dran pa na bar bzhug ma med mi mi dmigs so// de bzhin gyur te/ na stong
45b8(khri brgyad): kyi phyi dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'i da srong pa nyid kyi bar gyi sa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du medan/ de sa byis pa
46a1(khri brgyad): na na nas yod pa ma yin pas yad par btags so// de dag ni 'ad tuste/ rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas de dag ni tshe ne mi mtha sa / chos gang dag med pa de dag
46a2(khri brgyad): lan rtog par byed do// bdugs nas kyang ming dang gzugs byal 'don par nan pa nag de bzhin du sbyar ba/ yang rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar mamangon pa gan to/ 
46a3(khri brgyad): de dag ngon pa rten pa zhidi yin pas na yod la pa yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog par byed pa'i phyir de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ga yin no// de dag cizhi ga mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes
46a4(khri brgyad): thong ngo // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa me shes mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
46a5(khri brgyad): ke khyer mi shes shing / mi mthong ba de'i phyir byim pa se so'i bya bo rnams zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khabs nas nges par
46a6(khri brgyad): bam yin no// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'thung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// byang chub sems
46a7(khri brgyad): / dpa'i chos rnams su ngas par 'byung ba ma yin no// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches padag yin te/ gzugs stong pa nyid du yid
46a8(khri brgyad): mimiches so// de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid dang 'du shes stong panyid dang / 'du byed rnams stong bzhi dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du yid mi ches pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang
46b1(khri brgyad): mchis /  de dag na mi gnas pa dag yin te/ gang la le gnas na/ sbyin pa'i pha ro tu phyin pal mi gnas banag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i byar sA mI gnas so// phyir mi ldeg pa'i
46b2(khri brgyad): ras shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la me gnas te/ rgungs na byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya/ mngon par zhen pa zhes bya'o// mi zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhing de dag
46b3(khri brgyad): gang la mngon par zhen pa na zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin du mi yal mngon par zhen pa nas/ de bzhin du yid kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// 
46b4(khri brgyad): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin du khams rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gtas ka rnams la mngon par
46b5(khri brgyad): bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// dran pa de bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa na pa/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// de
46b6(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gal to// bdun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ltar na slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
46b7(khri brgyad): slob ba ma lags shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi
46b8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa pa yin zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ngas pa 'ablang ba ma yin no// gtsam pa/ 'on ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu 'dil rgya
47a1(khri brgyad): sems dpang sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
47a2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to// de bzhin du
47a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag tu rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to// mngon par zhen nas kyang thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
47a4(khri brgyad): byed do// yongs su brtags nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
47a5(khri brgyad): ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
47a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nges par 'byung ba ma lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
47a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'thung ba me yin no// 
47a8(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
47b1(khri brgyad): chen po de ltar srob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
47b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
47b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ma spyod pa na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no// mi dmigs pa yang gang zhe na/ gang / 
47b4(khri brgyad): na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid mi dmigs pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar/ 
47b5(khri brgyad): demi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
47b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhid du nges par 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa
47b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos tham
47b8(khri brgyad): nang gi thob tshigs kyimadzes pa sung po/ napa na da mtsha na dzin kyimags so/ na sa ga ga
48a1(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur lags bcwom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor theg pa des ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar
48a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gal ba de nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nyid du gnas par 'gyur la/ de yang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
48a3(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyig ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/ 
48a4(khri brgyad): pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams ni nges par mi 'byung nges par 'byung bar mi 'a
48a5(khri brgyad): nges par ma byung ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de bzhin du
48a6(khri brgyad): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad cing / de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// 
48a7(khri brgyad): bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
48a8(khri brgyad): bar 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ grub pa dang bde ba la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// gang mtshan nyid chen pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa do spong ba'i khams la nges par
48b1(khri brgyad): ba dod du zad do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la
48b2(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'dod du 'dra ba dang / de bzhin du de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du byed do// deci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
48b3(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
48b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar draba'
48b5(khri brgyad): gzugs ni gzugs kyis spyod/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
48b6(khri brgyad): la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi stong pa nyid pa nges par 'byung bar 'dod du da do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg
48b7(khri brgyad): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas/ de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mig gi stong pa
48b8(khri brgyad): khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ri// de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te
49a1(khri brgyad): de khams gsus nas nges par 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi la yang gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mig ni mig
49a2(khri brgyad): spong sa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du stong pa dang / de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'ang ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
49a3(khri brgyad): spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mi lam nges par 'thung bar 'dod du zad do// de bzhin du mtsha
49a4(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sku ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
49a5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir
49a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du sgyun 'ang ba da dang/ smi/  dang / zug ca dbu/ mIg yod dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrul pa'i dri ba 'di ni khams gsum na sangs par 'byung ba ma yin zhing/ rnam pa sngam
49a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mi lam rdzi ngo po 'di ni rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang
49a8(khri brgyad): srud/ zag cha dang / mig yong dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rdzam da bye ba re/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bral 'ji zon kyi bar gyim stong gyi ra// rab 'byor na
49b1(khri brgyad): na da yod pa'i chos dmas la ngas par 'byung bar 'dod pa blang phyid pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha la tu phyin pa la A par 'byung bar 'dod du 'a do// rab byang du bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
49b2(khri brgyad): la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / babod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
49b3(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du bad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin
49b4(khri brgyad): nyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
49b5(khri brgyad): byin pa dang / brasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo 'ad na khams gsum nas nges par 'thung ba ma yin zhing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di la yang
49b6(khri brgyad): bye phyir ro//  phyir na// ra 'byor di la sbyin pa'i na pa'i po da// sbyin de sbyin pa banyid kyis spyo shi/ rab 'byor bzhin tshul khrimasakyi
49b7(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo da dang / bcad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nga ba de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
49b8(khri brgyad): nipa'ang banyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro// rab byor de bzhin du mtshan ni men pa'i chos rnams sa des par 'byung bar 'did pa gang yi pa de ni nang stong ba 'idi langes par 'byung bar 'dod pad te
50b1(khri brgyad): denan/ 'di ltar de bzhin du snad te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi ngo na nyid gang yin pa de ni/ khams gsum nas ngas par 'thung ba ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dad
50b2(khri brgyad): gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyidi ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
50b3(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs btsu nga/ mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / ma sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres su bcolaca kyi 'ang du pags
50b4(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par bstan pa kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bAr bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'thung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa zag pa
50b5(khri brgyad): zad bskye bar 'dod du zad do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
50b6(khri brgyad): 'ardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i ni zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing / rnam
50b7(khri brgyad): ma khyen pa de la yang gnos pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// ci'i phyi she / rab 'byor 'di com pa zag ba bud pa nganan na/ dgra 'irnam pa bo da kyis stong// na sangs ma
50b8(khri brgyad): mi/ rang sangs rgyas kyar can kyis stong// de bzhin gshegs can tshad da de/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ongo bo nyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos dpas la nges par
51a1(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ spun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams ma nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang
