126a4(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam rnam par dag pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa nas/ sangs rgya
126a5(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom
126a6(khri brgyad): 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag med pa'i phyir ro// gso
126a7(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags so// de bzhin du lan cig phyir bong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
126a8(khri brgyad): rtsom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang/ rang byang du ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba rnam pa ga pa lagasas// mam ldad padas kyim bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag shi rnam pas
126b1(khri brgyad): pa'i nga ngo // gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ca'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byadra bab kyi mang du rnam pa dzag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phul ba
126b2(khri brgyad): sa 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ba ni kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags so// ba ma ldar 'das kyis
126b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ 
126b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag med pa'i phyir dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang / shes pa po med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnyis rnam par dag pas thob
126b5(khri brgyad): mchis shing mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med do// gsol pa/ btsun
126b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnyis rnam par dag pas thob pa ma mchis shing mngon par rtogs par mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byin ci log las byung ba'i phyir ro// gsol/ 
126b7(khri brgyad): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag sum mchis pa'i slad du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
126b8(khri brgyad): sprul pa/ rab 'byor bdag shin tan ma par dag pa'i phyir // gsal la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag du chis pa'i slad du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nams
127a1(khri brgyad): / rnam par shes pa sum mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// maH'a mas 'das pa stong pa nyin dang / logs dang thar med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir bdag med pa'i
127a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni byangan la sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos
127a3(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de ltar rtogs pa gang lags par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
127a4(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
127a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa 'di snyam du gzugs kyis gzugs mi shes so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa mi shes so// 'das pa'i
127a6(khri brgyad): rjes rnams kyis 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes so// pa 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyis ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams mi shes so// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes so// 
127a7(khri brgyad): na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
127a8(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyis rnam pa thams cad pa khyen pa nyid mi shes so snyam du sems ca/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
127b1(khri brgyad): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ ji skad sbas pa de bzhin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
127b2(khri brgyad): so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sang pa thabs la mkhas pa la gnyis kyi 'du shes 'byung ngam/ de skad ces smras pa
127b3(khri brgyad): dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces na 'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes
127b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du gyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa song ba nyid dang / 'dus
127b5(khri brgyad): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid dang / thogam dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
127b6(khri brgyad): dasod pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// 'di la sbyin pa yin par bya'o// sbyin pa 'di 'dra ba zhig sbyin par bya'o// bdag gis tshul
127b7(khri brgyad): bsrung bar bya'o// tshul khrims 'di ltar bsrung bar bya'o// bdag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// bamed pa 'di ltar bskam par bya'o// bdag gis 'dzin 'grus brgyas par bya'o// brtson 'grus 'di sa
127b8(khri brgyad): brtsam par bya'o// bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o// bsam gtan la'ang khyer groms par 'jug par bya'o// bdag gis shes pa'i bsgom par bya'o// shes rab 'di ltar
128a1(khri brgyad): / bsgom par bya'o// bdag gis bsod nams bskyed par bya'o// bsod nams 'di ltar bskyed par bya'o// dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o// byang chub
128a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'di ltar 'jug par bya'o// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ltar yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag gis sems can
128a3(khri brgyad): rnams yongs su smin par bya'o// sngams can rnams 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
128a4(khri brgyad): kang rjes su thob par bya'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la
128a5(khri brgyad): mkhas pa med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bung dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thab pa la mkhas pa'i chags pa med pa yin no// 
128a6(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'dis ces smras so// chenang ldan parab 'byor nam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyis
128a7(khri brgyad): dag gi chags pa dag yin par reg par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis// lha'i dbang pob rgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems pa
128a8(khri brgyad): legs pa'i rigs kyi bu'ang/ rigs kyi bu ma ni reng gi sems su su tu shes/ sbyin pa kun du byes// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu shes/ tshul khrims su kun du shel/ tshul khrimapa
128b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa kun du shes/ bzod par kun du shes/ 'azod pa'i pharol tu phyin par kun du shes/ bcan 'grus su kun du shes/ brtson 'asus kyi la phyin par kun du shes/ sasam gtan du k+Shar
128b2(khri brgyad): shes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par kun du shes/ she rab kun du shes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par kun du shes/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid du kun du shes/ byi stong pa nyid dang / 
128b3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid du kun du shes pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kud du shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhir kun du shes pa nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
128b4(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'i slar du kun du shes pa dang / de bzhi no gshegs pa'i skabs pa na kun du shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bci brgyad kyi bar du kun du shem/ sangs rgyas su kun du shes/ sa sa
128b5(khri brgyad): bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun du shes shing / chos de dag thams cad kyang brtul cing bsdus te sems can tham pa cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
128b6(khri brgyad): yongs su 'asngo bar byed la/ de yang yongs su bsngo bar kun tu shes pa ste/ kau shi ka de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi'u'am/ rigs kyi rul dang dge chags pa yin par rig pa
128b7(khri brgyad): chags pa de dag dang kun tu 'brel na chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par mi nus s+ho// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gzugs kyi rang babazhin ni yongs su bsngob pa'i nas la/ 
128b8(khri brgyad): 'du shes dag 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nga na na pongs su ba po'i ma sa na ca da du gongam pa da du bya te/ rnam pa tharas cad ma byon pa da kyi byer ba
129a1(khri brgyad): /  shika chub sems dpa mams phyog/  tul da chos mas ca ma da ma' ba
129a2(khri brgyad): thams cad du 'byung ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par dga' bar bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par
129a3(khri brgyad): yang dag pa gzing stod par bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyon/  da po sbyin par byed pa'o// dag ni tshul khrims bsrung ba'o// 
129a4(khri brgyad): ba bsgom pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o// bdag ni shes raba' sgom pa'o// bdag nin ba stong ma nyid la spyod pa'o// 'dag ni
129a5(khri brgyad): nyid la spyod pa'o// bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyong pa'o// bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdom pa'o// de ba zhin du sbyar te/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
129a6(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bsgom pa'o// bdag ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa'o// snyam du mtshan ma las rngam par rtog pa dag lengal mi bya / da ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
129a7(khri brgyad): kye bu mo gzhan dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par dga' bar byed 'ab 'dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par gzer stod par bya/ yang dag par bstan pa
129a8(khri brgyad): bya'o// de yang dag par dka' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par 'dzi bug zhug pa dag yang dag par gzeng stod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de sa gzhan dag yang dag par dga' bar byed cing / 
129b1(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / yang dag par gzang stod pa dang / yang dag par ston par byed pan/ bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis
129b2(khri brgyad): bsngags pa la yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur ro// de ltar byed pa'i rigs kyi smra'am/ rigs kyi bu bdas ni chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ngo // de na pa bcom
129b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa'i mtha' yongs su skyong ba dang / 
129b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang chags pa'i mtha'
129b5(khri brgyad): shakyang legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o// 
129b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis del 'di skad mas bka' stsal to la 'byor 'di sa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa la la zhig/ de bzhin sa
129b7(khri brgyad): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/ dbya 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
129b8(khri brgyad): pa'adas pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag gis thugs dang po bskyod pa nas bzung ste/ ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar skabs de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang len pa de
130a1(khri brgyad): / thams dang mtshan pa yid la byed cing mtshan mar yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad dang ldan mong du byas nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bcwa
130a2(khri brgyad): na/ rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa datsam du chags pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi nyan pas rnams kyi dge ba rirje ba rnams dang de las ga
130a3(khri brgyad): ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
130a4(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ tsam du sems can rnams mtshan mar yi la byed pa ni de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngob ma yin te de tsam du chags pa
130a5(khri brgyad): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang mtshan mar yid la
130a6(khri brgyad): kyab ma yin pa'i phyir // de nas bcom ldan 'dis la che dang ldan parab 'byed kyis 'dis ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bab pa lags so// 
130a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
130a8(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar ma byas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
130b1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma thus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin man gnyis su med de/ rab 'byor chos kyi rang
130b2(khri brgyad): de ka cika kho nar zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de de rang bzhin med pa yin no// rab 'byor rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i rang bzhin yin no// yang dag pa'i rang
130b3(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin med pa mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na/ chags pa'i ma
130b4(khri brgyad): thams cad rnam par spangs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di sad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dga' ba
130b5(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos rnam par ma shes so// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
130b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sems kyis ma bskyed/ gzugs kyi
130b7(khri brgyad): ma yin/ tshor pos ma yin/ 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma bskyed do// de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma
130b8(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis ma bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcus ma bskyed/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas gyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi ba dag gis
131a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pa la sbyin pa Sh+T+ri sa/ rnam par dag pa'i lel zhes 'o// dmam pamaldan 'a da ldan par \u0f7fsa 'dun sa
131a2(khri brgyad): to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bkye ba ma mchis pa'i byed pa po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang / 
131a3(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par
131a4(khri brgyad): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi spyod na/ 
131a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya
131a6(khri brgyad): dedri bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad pa byed pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs rtagacos byam 'al/ mi rtag ces byab mo spyod na/ don shes
131a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa sashis btag ces bya ba'am/ se rtag ces bya bar mi spong na/ ri ni shes ris gyi pa ma du kyi
131a8(khri brgyad): la spyod payin no// gzugs pa de zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyad / de ni shes sa kyis ma khyen pa la spyad pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'dushes dang / 'a byed rnapas dang
131b1(khri brgyad): dam dang shes pa bduzhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyad na/ don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin na// gzugs bdag cal bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod
131b2(khri brgyad): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ den
131b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs stong zhes smra ba 'am/ me stong zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
131b4(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma
131b5(khri brgyad): ces bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma med ces
131b6(khri brgyad): me spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin
131b7(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs zhe
131b8(khri brgyad): bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes po zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes
132a1(khri brgyad): / bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs dben zhes bya ba 'am/ ma dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
132a2(khri brgyad): yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba 'am/ med pan zhes kyang mi smi na/ ra ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
132a3(khri brgyad): na no// gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
132a4(khri brgyad): dernams dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs skye zhes bya
132a5(khri brgyad): bai s+ya zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am/ mi
132a6(khri brgyad): bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs 'gag ces bya ba 'am/ mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 
132a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag ces bya ba 'am/ mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 
132a8(khri brgyad): gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
132b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa shesas das pa yod ces bya ma'am/ dngos pa med rtseb kya ba mi spyod na/ de ni shes sa kyi rol tu phyin pa la smod pa yin no// gzugs gtsang zhes bya ba 'am/ mi gcang nas
132b2(khri brgyad): smod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtsang zhes bya ba'am/ mi gtsang zhes bya ba
132b3(khri brgyad): spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba nas/ de bzhin du mig gi bar la gtsa
132b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'am/ mi gtsang zhes bya bar mi spyod no// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
132b5(khri brgyad): spyong bar/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya
132b6(khri brgyad): 'am/ stong zhes bya ba'am/ mi stong shes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya ba'am/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma
132b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba 'am/ dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par byung zhes bya ba 'am/ skye zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gag ces bya ba'am/ dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/ 
132b8(khri brgyad): 'dis po meng ces byaba'am/ gcang shes bya ba'am/ mi gcang zhes byas sa yang dag par rjes ma mi mthong / de bzhin du tsha ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnam pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin
133a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ gtsang zhes bya ba 'am/ mi gtsang zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par rdzas su me mthong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
133a2(khri brgyad): la tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ gzugs yongs rdzogs zhes bya ba'am/ yongs su 'jigs zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ ngan shes me rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du ma ba dang / 'ang
133a3(khri brgyad): shes dang/ 'du khyod rnamapa dang / rnam pa shes pa yongs rdzogapa zhes kya / yengs mdzug pan mi ngas do shegs kyi khyon pal srid pa yin// de
133a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'ang/ yongs su mardzogs zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes ras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir nan/ 
133a5(khri brgyad): nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
133a6(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs shing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs pa'i phyi
133a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das lan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyinga'am/ rigs kyi
133b1(khri brgyad): rnams kyi chags pa ma mchis pa de dag legs par bshad pa ni ngo mtshar lags sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// rnga skad sbas pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin na grags pa
133b2(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyibu'am rigs kyi ma rnams kyi chags pa med pa dag lags par bshad pa lan ni/ rab 'byor ga
133b3(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
133b4(khri brgyad): yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags zhes bya ba'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de
133b5(khri brgyad): du mi ka dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags zhes bya ba'ag/ mchags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du gzugs dang / skra dang dri dang
133b6(khri brgyad): reg pa dang / chos nam sa chags zhes bya ba'am/ mchags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rolan gyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du ston pa'i pharol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
133b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi
133b8(khri brgyad): deni shes rab kyi pha ma tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar to// dran pa nye sa ba zhag pa rnams chags zhes bya ba'am/ ma chags nas bya ba mi spyod / de ni shes rab kyi pha la tukhyen pal 'a
134a1(khri brgyad): no// de bzhin du 'phags pa' lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du chags zhes bya ba'am/ mchags zhes byab mthod na/ den shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la srud pa yin no// de bzhinan
134a2(khri brgyad): pa'i stobs bcu chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chag
134a3(khri brgyad): bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags zhes bya ba'am/ ma chags zhes
134a4(khri brgyad): bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ zugs chags zhes bya bar yang dag par shes so// 
134a5(khri brgyad): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags zhes bya bar yang dag par shesas// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags zhes bya ba ba
134a6(khri brgyad): gas zhes so// de bzhin sulan cig ba'i 'grus da/ phyi ma 'ong ba'i sa dag bcom pa nyid du/ byang chub dang / smin me pa ladu / 
134a7(khri brgyad): du chags shes bya bar yang dag par shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsel to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos zab mo 'di ma bshad
134a8(khri brgyad): 'gris pa ma mchis la bshad kyang 'phel bam mchis pa ni mtshar lags 'o// de gad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan parab 'byor pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
134b1(khri brgyad): byong na bzhin no// de skad smras par bzhan tu/ chos rab ma 'dam ba shad kyang 'gra med pa/ bshad kyang 'phel ba medad// rab 'byod dpa na/ dbazhan gnad pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapa/ 
134b2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nam mkha'i bsngags pa brjod na/ nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib
134b3(khri brgyad): do// rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ne bsngags pa brjod pas 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos de gA shad kyang 'phel ba
134b4(khri brgyad): med la/ pa bshad kyang 'grib pa med de/ bshad kyang de kho nar zad la/ ma bshad kyang de kho nar zad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// @cu
134b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na/ mi zhum mi 'gong ste/ zhum par 'a
134b6(khri brgyad): ma mchis la/ zhum pa ma mchis shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba po gyid pa la gas
134b7(khri brgyad): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta s+t+wa~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin te/ 
134b8(khri brgyad): mkha' la ni sher rab kyi rol du phyin pa ma mchis pa nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i bar du ma mchil na ma mkha' la ni gzugs mchis/ tshor ba dag / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa
135a1(khri brgyad): shes pa ma mchig/ nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis pa nas/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyin zhing banyid da med ma 'ang nanyid kyi bar du ma mchog/ rnams
135a2(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis panapa// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mam chis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas gyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargya
135a3(khri brgyad): bar du ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / 
135a4(khri brgyad): kunam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchin pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes/ gam chen po 'di 'chal ba dgani kyi/ 
135a5(khri brgyad): kyi ba'i gnas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du ga cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i slad du bstan par 'tshal ba dang / bab par 'tshal ba dang / 
135a6(khri brgyad): bar 'tshal ba dag lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag / sems can rnams 'khor ba las thar ba ba kye bar 'tshal zhing go cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag na nam mkha' yongs su thar par
135a7(khri brgyad): bar 'tshal ba lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni bar snang 'deg par 'tshal ba lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chu
135a8(khri brgyad): semamapa 'a sems papa sa chen po gang dag pa mi can rnams kyi byed du/ sprin med pa yang dag pa 'ardzogs pa mas rgyas pa de gan na pagrus chen chen yob las so// na
135b1(khri brgyad): ldan das kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang dag sems can ma dadu/ blan ma rdzogs pa kyi chub tum na/  zhugs pa da na 'a
135b2(khri brgyad): 'dul yod pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang daklan ma mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgya
135b3(khri brgyad): tub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba lags shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
135b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de gzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha tsug gis dper bgyin/ 'dam bu'i
135b5(khri brgyad): las/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'gras sa lu'i zhing dag mda' chu'i tshal ltar yongs su bltam par gyur cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par/ 
135b6(khri brgyad): zhugs te/ chom bshad par gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sems can dpag tum mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ chad ma mchis padag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / btsun pa bcom ldan
135b7(khri brgyad): 'das sems can gyi khams la ni bril 'am/ gang par mi mngon lags so// de ci'i lung du zher/ sems can sa mchis pa'i srad du dang / sems can dper pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ kyo
135b8(khri brgyad): na rgyab par sbya skye/ tsun dam san pa 'degad du dag sems car rnams drug chen tsha la dang blan med pal / 
136a1(khri brgyad): / par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni namamasa' phangs su thar b.rab kya 'tshal ba lags so zhes mchi lags so// denas 'a'adza ni nang
136a2(khri brgyad): grong zhig 'di ma du/ kye ma btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' yang mi skye mi 'khrag kyang tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mches/ ting nge 'din gyi phung po yang mchi ba/ shes rab kyi phung po yang mchis
136a3(khri brgyad): dkrol ba'i phung ba yang mches/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pa yang mchis shing / de bzhin du rgan du zhugs pa yang mchis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa
136a4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mchis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang mchis/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog
136a5(khri brgyad): chos dkon mchog kyang mchis/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// snyam mo// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya
136a6(khri brgyad): na kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug pa de/ gang la rnal
136a7(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ tshe ngathun pa rab 'byom gyis smras pa/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu khyen pa la rnal 'byor du sgoms par 'jug par bya bar sems pa de na nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du snyoms par
136a8(khri brgyad): dug pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsal to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
136b1(khri brgyad): da / ngan mdu dang / klog 'a dang / rgyal bzhin du dam cad ma bdag gos 'asungs dang / bskya pa dang / sra ba den du nag kyi lags/ de nas ma
136b2(khri brgyad): byor / wa'i da rkyen pa 'dis ces smras so// sheg nyid kyis ga sa zung bad/  par byam gang yang dag pa sa su mthong ma/ sprus pa/ btsun pa
136b3(khri brgyad): yin no// smras pa/ kau shi kla gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi sum dadag de skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas na/ de nyid de dag gi bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sbab bya bar 'gyur/ 
136b4(khri brgyad): de dag la ni mi dang / mi ma yin pa glags tshal ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
136b5(khri brgyad): pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o//  shi ka gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa dag la bsrung ba dang / 
136b6(khri brgyad): bskyab pa dang / srab bya bar sems pa de ni rnam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / srab bya bar sems pa yin no// kau shi ka khyod kyis rmi lam dang / smig sku dang / mig yor dang / sbrum dang / sprul pa
136b7(khri brgyad): la bsrung ba dang / bskyal ba dang / sba bar nus sam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin du gapa nig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136b8(khri brgyad): dgal bzu pa dang / bskyab pa dang / srab bya bar sems pani 'dis ste/ m-i 'grub pa dang ngam pa'i rnal la can du 'gyur gag ni ga 'di de lam du mas// khyod kyis de bzhi gshegs pa'am// 
137a1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i skul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra bar nus sam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' se
137a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / slob bya bar sems pa de ni 'di lta ste/ mi 'grub pa dang / ral pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur bar zad do// 
137a3(khri brgyad): shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems// khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra bar nus sa ma/ 
137a4(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no// smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'grub pa dang / ngal pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur bar bad do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshen
137a5(khri brgyad): parab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pasA re shig rmi lam lta bu dang / smig
137a6(khri brgyad): zla dang / brag cha lta bu dang / sbyim lta bu dang / sprul pa lta phur / chos rnams de ltar yongs su shes pa yin/ de shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che las rlom sems su mi byed/ 
137a7(khri brgyad): sarlom sems su mi byed pa yin no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
137a8(khri brgyad): kyis na pa'i da sa ka ma gyis kyi rgya kyi sem sus kyis kyi la sa kyi
137b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlos sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa'i rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa
137b2(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed la/ de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cadan mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams can
137b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos
137b4(khri brgyad): rnams rmi lam lta bu nas/ chos rnams sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes pa yin te/ de shes nas rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi las kyi rlom sems su mi byed/ mi
137b5(khri brgyad): lam la rlom sems su mi byed pa nas/ sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no// de nas sangs
137b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din rgyal tshon bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sr-im cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang rtse
137b7(khri brgyad): / kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs 'khor rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od gsal gyi lha rnams nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha gang dag ye
137b8(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad kyis su'i me tog dag dang / skya'i tsin dan gyi phyem dag dang / spos kyi bye bdag bcom ldan 'das shA kya thul las gtor nag bcom ldan 'das shA kya grub pa g.yab de sogs chu dang
138a1(khri brgyad): / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag pos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu la ldan no// de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi wa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi
138a2(khri brgyad): mthus shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba
138a3(khri brgyad): dal/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu bar byed pa dag mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang
138a4(khri brgyad): ngagi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas stong stong mthong bar gyur te/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rgya cher thams cad
138a5(khri brgyad): sbya bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
138a6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sna phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro// bskul pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
138a7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba/ bam
138a8(khri brgyad): bcu dgu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoram gyis 'di/  ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis bya
138b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par
138b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
138b3(khri brgyad): bo byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs
138b4(khri brgyad): bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / 
138b5(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs sman pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med
138b6(khri brgyad): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar chos ston par mi'i khur ro// 
138b7(khri brgyad): gzugs kun nas nyon mongs shes bya ba dang / rnam par byang zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs skye zhes bya ba dang / 'gag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs dngos po
138b8(khri brgyad): de ces bya ba dang / dngos po med ces bya bar tshis ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs gtsang zhes bya ba dang / mi gtsang zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba dang / 
139a1(khri brgyad): / zol zhes bya ba mam ldan par 'gyur ro// gzugs de sgrub bzhin du tshong ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / nam pa shes pa bcas zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya ba'i bar dadu
139a2(khri brgyad): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya ba dang / ma 'ongs shes bya ba dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
139a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba dang / ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang / da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das zhes bya ba dang
139a4(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang / da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag ces bya ba dang / shin du rnam par ma dag ces bya bar chos smon par mi
139a5(khri brgyad): // de bzhin du tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes bzhin du rnam par dag ces bya ba dang / shin du rnam par mdag ces bya bang chob ston par mi 'gyung ngo // de bzhin du myu
139a6(khri brgyad): dam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rna ya dag ces bya ba dang / shin tu rnam pa ma dag ces bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'byod kyis
139a7(khri brgyad): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsam pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dge pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
139a8(khri brgyad): la tu byin pa pong sre ga pa'i // byar byod de bzhin du kyang ba dang / 'du shes dang / la byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa congs sud pa'i phyir shesas kyi mngos du phyin pa yongs sud pa
139b1(khri brgyad): gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
139b2(khri brgyad): bya shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyongs su dge ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / na rnaMs
139b3(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 
139b4(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
139b5(khri brgyad): yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nas
139b6(khri brgyad): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa'i phyir// nam mkha' yongs su drag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs gos pa med pa'i phyir/ shes
139b7(khri brgyad): pangs tu phyin pa yongs su dag yid // debazhin du tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byen rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nos pamed pa'i phyi/ shes sa kyi mngab tu phyin pa 'ongs su dag ma yin no/ gsol
139b8(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'ad ji ltar nanam ma kha' gas pa ma mchis pa'i rgyu rgya/ shes rab kyi pa tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcoms na 'das kyis bka' sum gang bas byon rnam
140a1(khri brgyad): / phyer/ shes rab kyi pha rol tukhyen pa yongs su dag pa yin no// debazhin du nam mkha' ma tha snyad gdags su me par bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// 6nga
140a2(khri brgyad): dped dan mam parda la zag cha gnyis kyi sgra klag pa de zhin du/ rab byor namam kha'al basmad gdags su med pa'i rkyeg sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// gsalapa/ btsun
140a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la
140a4(khri brgyad): yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad bye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 
140a5(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun
140a6(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byung bayi ches pa'i sla du/ shes rab kyi ros tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shi
140a7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am
140a8(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo gang ma la na/ shes rab kyi po ra tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun nub par babyin pa dang / klog ma dang / tshul bzhin du mi ma bgyid pa del ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasami
140b1(khri brgyad): nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ sngand 'thung bar mi 'gyur/ lce nad 'byung bar ma 'gyur/ yan lag ma tshang bar ma 'gyur/ lus ha cang 'khogs par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'gum par mi
140b2(khri brgyad): lags so// 'di lta ste/ rgyal chen 'a seMs kyi lha rnams nas/ gnas gtsang ba'i ba kyi skya dag dang / sa skyong srugasang podag kyang de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lags so// ches brgyad dang / chos bcu bzhi
140b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos ston pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton bgyid pa dang / 'chad par lha'i tshogs mang po mchi bar 'gyur zhing / bsod nams dpag tu ma
140b4(khri brgyad): grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa mang po dag kyang bskyed par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo
140b5(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de chos brgyad dang / tshes bcu bzhi dang / chos bco lnga la shes rab kyi phar
140b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chad par byed pa na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med pa mang po dag bskyed par 'gyur zhing
140b7(khri brgyad): deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chad par byed pa na lha'i 'khor mdun du gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
140b8(khri brgyad): na po che yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de mngon pa chen rid yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de sems can dmyal bar 'grol la la yongs su thar par byed pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
141a1(khri brgyad): / 'jig rten dang / mi dbul po dang / gnad sbyin dbul po dang / klu dbul po las yongs su zad par byed pa yin no// gzhan yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po ste bu rnams su sbyin par byed pa dang / 
141a2(khri brgyad): gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams da/ tshong dpon shing sA la chen po lta thu rnams sbyidan par byed pa dang / de bzhin du
141a3(khri brgyad): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba sbyin par byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba sbyin par byed pa dang / de bzhin
141a4(khri brgyad): suzhugs pa'i 'bras pa sbyin par byed pa das / de bzhin du stan gyis bye 'o sa su dang / phying mi 'ong ba ma dang/ sra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dag/ blan med pa lang da pa
141a5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub smin par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs nas/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen
141a6(khri brgyad): lta bu dag ringag rten sdod pa dang / de bzhin du sbom po'i rigs shing sAl chen po ltang du dag dang / khyim bdag ga rigs shing sAl chen po lta bu dag dang / tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po ltu
141a7(khri brgyad): dag nga de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi bar dag 'jig rten na yod pa dang / de bzhin du tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa'i
141a8(khri brgyad): don pa dang / tshangs 'khor rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chen rnam pa dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad medan 'o rnam pa dang / 'od galal rnams dang / dge ba rnams dang / dge rlung nam sa da// 
141b1(khri brgyad): tshad med dge rnams dang / da kyang rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar kyi sgra rnams 'jig rten na yod pa dang / de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / de bzhin du
141b2(khri brgyad): / phying nga ba'i 'bras sa / phyi mi 'ad ba'i 'bras cudang / dgra bcom pa nyid da/ rang byang chub da / blan med pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i rgya'i jo/ na na yod par 'gyu ba dang / rab byor du na
141b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la ni bsam gtan bzhi bstan pa yod pa dang / de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bstan pa yod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa la/ 
141b4(khri brgyad): dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byazod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rom tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa
141b5(khri brgyad): bas de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid bstan pa yod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid bstan pa yod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bstan pa yod pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
141b6(khri brgyad): stobs bcu bstan pa yod pa dang / gong ma bzhin du gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bangar du ston pa yod de/ de la bslabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyan
141b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na yod pa'i phyir te/ des na 'di sa ste/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni da 'i 'jo du phyin pa zhes bya'o// rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bskye ba'am/ 'gag pa lag/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am
141b8(khri brgyad): pang kyang ba'ag/ yongs su gzung bar bya'a'am/ gtang bar bya ba ma dpa yang med do// 'i phyir rnyen/ 'di gyur chos gang za bye ba 'am/ 'gagapa la gsun na pa nyon mongs pa'al/ rnam par byang sa ma/ yongs
142a1(khri brgyad): gsung sar byabs// ga bya ba da bya // tsa byangan sa tu byed pa ni ma dag sa yang brtan du pa pa na/ lung brtan du med pa na/ 'dig nyin
142a2(khri brgyad): 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang brgyas pa'am/ bka pa med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus pa byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ rin po che'i pha rol du
142a3(khri brgyad): pa'adi ni dmigs su mang ba yin no// rab 'byor rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gang dag gis rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa gos par
142a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ de ltar yang kun du mi 'dzin cing / de ltar yang rnam pa
142a5(khri brgyad): rtog par mi byed la/ de ltar yang spros par mi byed na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkung sti dang / ri mo dang / mchod pa byed du sangs rgyas kyi ni
142a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na/ sems can 'bum dag kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed par
142a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston par byed pa'am/ mi ston par byed pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ sbyin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/ 'gag par byed pa'am/ 
142a8(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/ rnam par byung bar byed pa'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no// 'da'am yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// rab 'byor
142b1(khri brgyad): ra kyi ngos tu phyin pa ni/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dod pa'i khams su 'jig par byed la yin no// gzugs kyi 'ams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yad/ gzugs kyi khams su 'jog par byed
142b2(khri brgyad): yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyid par byed pa ma yin/ 'dod bar byed pa ma yin/ tshul khyims
142b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa skyed par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dod bar
142b4(khri brgyad): pa sa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dong bar byed pa ma yin// nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin pa
142b5(khri brgyad): byed ya yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yA yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / da
142b6(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dod 'a byed pa ma yin/ ra kya chub sbyin par byed pa na/ 'dod bar byed pa yi/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dod bar byed pa ma yin/ rnam
142b7(khri brgyad): bathams cad ma khyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nis som skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dong bar byed pa ma yin no// 
142b8(khri brgyad): thugs pa chos rnams byin par byed pas yin/ 'dod par byed pa yin no// dgra bcom pa'i ba gyi tshol rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dod bar byed pa' yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshes rnams byed
143a1(khri brgyad): / byed pa ma yin/ 'dod bar byed pa ma yin/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyam cu chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dong bar byed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143a2(khri brgyad): ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dod par byed pa ma yin/ 'dus sa byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa
143a3(khri brgyad): nams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// yang chos kyi dbyings de ni brjed ngas pa med pa dang / yongs su mi nyams par
143a4(khri brgyad): bar byed pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyilan 'a'od cing gzhi'i sgra ring zhes bton nas/ lha'i me to// ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dag gtor
143a5(khri brgyad): chog 'di skad ces a la la 'dzam bu gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo zhes 'dzed to// der lha'i bu stong phyag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcu
143a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor la bka' stsas pa/ rab 'byong ngos pa med pa 'ang ba nyid stong nyid kyi phyir 'angam bu'i gleng du chos kyi mthong po bskong ba 'di ni dngadapom yin no// gnyis pa ma yin
143a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang bskor bar bya ba'i phyir ngam/ ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces
143a8(khri brgyad): gsol to// 'dun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta shed ras gyi mong du phyin pa mi che ma gang bang bzhi sa bye bag 'os pas kyi med bye ba gnas pa ma lazhes pa'i dmi pom mchis pas
143b1(khri brgyad): da byong pa nyid de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sus pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong // de btsun du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i man/ 
143b2(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / de bzhin du dang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / byi stong pa nyid ni bye stong pa nyid kyis stong // phyinang stong pa nyid ni byed stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i rngon nyid nyo
143b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar ni/ dadas pa med pa jim nyid stong ba nyid kyis stong / dran pa nye bang gzhug pa rnams ni dranang nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni/ 'phags pa
143b4(khri brgyad): yan lag brgyad pas spong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
143b5(khri brgyad): gyis stong / so so'i skye bonas su skyo bas spyong / rgyun du 'ugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ kun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir mi 'ong
143b6(khri brgyad): 'byung na/ phyi mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong// dam pacom pa nyid ni chu ba ma brgya kyi stod/ rang kya chu ni byang chub kyis rtod/ byung chu'i sems dpa nga ba nyidade/ byang chub sems dpa'i ji nyid kyi
143b7(khri brgyad): stong/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad pasngon pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nga byad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
143b8(khri brgyad): / chu sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags te/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
144a1(khri brgyad): / po rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog pa
144a2(khri brgyad): bgyid pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis te/ chos gang gis kyang chos yang dag par rjes su ma myong ba nga/ skor bar babyed pam mchil lagasa'o// deci'i srang du zhes 'di ltar slongs nyid mchom gang yang gror
144a3(khri brgyad): pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
144a4(khri brgyad): ltar stong pa nyid ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/ smon pa ma mchi
144a5(khri brgyad): pani chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin parjod pa dang / 'chan pa dang / 'dogs pa dang / 'dog pa dang / rnam par 'byed
144a6(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par 'brel pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / 'jug par bgyid pa dang / 'chad par bgyid pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa yongs su dag pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144a7(khri brgyad): bshad pa 'di ni sus kyang bshad pa ma mchil la bstan pa yang ma mchis te/ sus kyang dril pa yang ma mchis/ lus kyang mngon sum du bgyid pa yang ma mchis lags so// de la ni gang yang mya ngan las 'das
144a8(khri brgyad): ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni yon gnas su bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba la na byed pa po dang / byed papo med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcud krung
144b1(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' las pa lags sa
144b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ chos thams
144b3(khri brgyad): dmanyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa
144b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags
144b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa
144b6(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsas pa/ rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan
144b7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming mi mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu skye
144b8(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni ma che ba ma mchil pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro// tsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha ngos tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ni
145a1(khri brgyad): / gzung du med 'i phyid ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa sa tu phyin pa dza rna mkhas pa lags 'o// bka' pa/ chol thams can gtan ma nga byang ba ma phyin ro// 'dun pa com ldan 'das
145a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis
145a3(khri brgyad): / lags so// bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad bems po nyid
145a4(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu
145a5(khri brgyad): na pa 'di na 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma la ma A pu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 
145a6(khri brgyad): rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brag cha stu bu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sgra dang rnab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom
145a7(khri brgyad): 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yor lta bu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ me long dang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdig rgyu lta bu lags so// 
145a8(khri brgyad): la pa/ chu'abab pa dmigs su med pa'i byed do// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan nas pa rob tu phyi pa 'di ni chum sna bu lags so// laga' stsal gas mtho med pa dmigs su med pa byang
145b1(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'dan kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags son bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i byed do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa rol
145b2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa 'di ni rnam par byung ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa nyin kyi phyir do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu sbyin pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa legs so// 51
145b3(khri brgyad): dul pa/ sogs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// 
145b4(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'da' pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rlos sems masachis pa lags so// bka' stsam pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin
145b5(khri brgyad): 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// bcud pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so// bka' stsal pa
145b6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chol thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i
145b7(khri brgyad): ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ cho ma thams cad kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod
145b8(khri brgyad): chag sa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sda pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsab pa/ zhe sdang po
146a1(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa nyid 'o// na pa com ldan 'das tu phyid pa du du ga mug sa pa lags so// bka' stsal ga nas na ma pa rnam pa na bya
146a2(khri brgyad): tsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dan nyon mongs pa ma chis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun rtog pa yod pas yin pa'i byed do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu byon pa
146a3(khri brgyad): desems can ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sems can yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'din srang du la mchis pa lags so// bkar stsal
146a4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ mtha' gnyis rnam
146a5(khri brgyad): sangs pa'i phyir ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa lags so// bka' phrul pa/ chos thams cad 'brel pa med pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu
146a6(khri brgyad): 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad pas yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di na ma
146a7(khri brgyad): par mi rtog pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal
146a8(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs bu med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa sa su phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' bral pa// chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi
146b1(khri brgyad): skyer ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags so// kal stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin rdza
146b2(khri brgyad): bsngal ba lag pa so// bka' du ba/ chos thams cad skyo ba med pa nyid kyi phyid do// tsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma sems pa lags so// bka' snyam pa/ chas thams cad ma
146b3(khri brgyad): par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 'atsun pa bcom
146b4(khri brgyad): 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsam pa/ chos thams cad ldog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong
146b5(khri brgyad): dalagapa so// bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs
146b6(khri brgyad): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyin stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ blunang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'ang
146b7(khri brgyad): sa tu phyin pa 'do stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so// kar stsas pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmig sa su med pa nyid kyi kyang // bdun pa bcom ldan 'das parab tu phyin pa'i dini chen po thong kyi
146b8(khri brgyad): so// bka' stsal pa/ chos pam sa cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyi ro// btsun pa comaldaldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa'i dod do// dam pa spod pa nyid pags so// bka' la/ don dpapa snang nyid
147a1(khri brgyad): / su med pa nyid kyi bying po// bdun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong / nyin lags sa// ga' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// 
147a2(khri brgyad): yom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma bya ba stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa
147a3(khri brgyad): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tham
147a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dbang ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba ma mchis pa stong pa nyid lags so// 
147a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos
147a6(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ nang dang phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan
147a7(khri brgyad): sa phyin pa 'di ni rang gi ba tshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal garang gi tshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams dben pa'i phyi mo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das parob tu phyin pa 'din
147a8(khri brgyad): ngongo nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa rol du sbyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags
147b1(khri brgyad): ka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshong ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa pacom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'din yang dag par sring ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dag dang ma dag
147b2(khri brgyad): chos dmigs su med pan byed do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das parab tu phyin pa 'don du 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so// ka' stsal pa/ du 'grub kye rkang sa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i byed do// btsun
147b3(khri brgyad): com ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so// bka' stsa
147b4(khri brgyad): stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan sanasags so// bka' sprul pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa
147b5(khri brgyad): com ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin
147b6(khri brgyad): stong pa lags so// kwa' stsal pa/ stong ba'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam sa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// tsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa tu phyin pa 'di nam na ma ma mchis pa lags so// bka' phrub / 
147b7(khri brgyad): rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsam pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
147b8(khri brgyad): sbyin pa 'din rnam par thar pa lags sa// bka' stsal ga/ nam par thangs brgyan dmags su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa ror du phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'dug pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 
148a1(khri brgyad): // mam gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa su dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'arol tu sbyin padzadan sbyin pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su
148a2(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lags so// bka' phul ba/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
148a3(khri brgyad): byin pa 'di ni bzod pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang / bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags so// 
148a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'din bsam gtan lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rnam par gabyings pa'i sems dmigs su med pa
148a5(khri brgyad): kyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin sgom
148a6(khri brgyad): bcu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyis rdza
148a7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa de la zhum pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ shes pa thams cad la
148a8(khri brgyad): bamed ci thogs pa med pa'i phying ro// tsun pa bcom ldan 'das rol tu phyin pa pa ni snyi rje chen po lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sems cad thams cad yongs su ma btangs nyid kyi sbyin to// btsun pa bcom par
148b1(khri brgyad): 'das pa ro su phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lags so// bka' stsal la/ nyan po pa dang / rungs sa rgyas gyi mos thams cad pas yang dag par 'das pa'i phyid do// btsun pa brtsams na 'dus
148b2(khri brgyad): 'aros tu kyi di de she gshegs pa lags so// ga' stsal pa/ gad mams cad du zhin dug sung ba chos nyid chen pa'i phyid do// tsun pa bcom ldan las chos sbyin pa 'di ni dkrung lags so// 
148b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la da'ang sgyur ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa tho tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams
148b4(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas para'i phyir ro// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dod pa na byed pa'i lha rnams dang gzugasar spyod pa'i lha gang dag ji snyed yod pa de sa thams cad ma'i me tog dpa
148b5(khri brgyad): spos dang / rgya spos dang / srig dang / a ka pu na ga'a'i phyil dga'atho zhing / bcom ldan 'das gal la de lags su do ni gyi nangs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhams gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu
148b6(khri brgyad): 'chod do// phyogs gcig tu la bad nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na skrod pa'i sgra de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'diskad ces gsal to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
148b7(khri brgyad): bshad pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu la gas/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis / de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha dag shA
148b8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa kha mo'i dini stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no// lhad gshes ras kyis yong tu phyin pa za ma 'di de mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / byon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can no// lhagag de bzhin du
149a1(khri brgyad): sbyin pal 'dzim nyid / ma pa na tad dang 'a sa snga mam na na das sun na mas mtshan nyid da/ 
149a2(khri brgyad): bar byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dngos pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin dono// lhad// shes 'os kyi pha rob tu phyin pabapa ma 'di ni mtshan nyid de sa su min yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'dog tan gyi don dum
149a3(khri brgyad): dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par mdzad de/ lha dag de dag don dam par de ma yin te/ lha da yi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dmug par mi nus so// 
149a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta bzad yid snya ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de'i mtshan nyid khom ben pa'i phyir ro// sa dang de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid nga 'du mi shes/ mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyi med dag bang
149a5(khri brgyad): shes/ mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes/ mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid med pa lang rab tu mi shes te/ lha dag/ de ltar na mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang // 
149a6(khri brgyad): / kati ga ga gis shes par gyur 'dras/ gang gas 'ang chung sri pan byed do// sahA/ tshan nyid nga / TI gzugs kyis mchon la dus byas pa ma yin/ chang ba dang / 'du shes/ 
149a7(khri brgyad): rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pas mngon par dus byas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa
149a8(khri brgyad): ded bzhin gyur te/ dngos po med pa'i nga ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar banag pa dam/ de bzhin du gyur te/ rnamangs mas cad sa byem pa nyid kyis
149b1(khri brgyad): mingon pa bdu byas pa ma yid do// lha'e bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni mi rnams sa / sem ldan namasasam/ bzhapa dang bcapa 'arnams pas/ ya rnams sam/ yang garten pa rnams sam/ 
149b2(khri brgyad): rten las 'das pa rnams sam/ 'dus byas rnams sam/ 'dus ma byas rnams kyang ma yin no// yang lha dag ga la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin zhe ba zer na/ ci khyed de la yang
149b3(khri brgyad): srags pa dag par sa smra / gas so pa/ bcoms na 'das patshan nyid shes pa gas ma ska lags slad ma/ tsun pa tham ldan 'ad yin
149b4(khri brgyad): gas pa'i slad du mtshan nyid gang dra ldan pa yang ma lags/ mi ldan pa ma lags te/ yamachis shid dmigs sul chis pa'i slad du'o// de skad cis gsol la dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
