174a8(khri brgyad): ba'o// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa mang pa'o// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa me
174b1(khri brgyad): 'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs par stobs bcu'i bar gyi sa ros ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi ba rol na
174b2(khri brgyad): rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// gzug
174b3(khri brgyad): pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// 
174b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du mig gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / led kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no// de bzhin du gzugs
174b5(khri brgyad): rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs rnams ma yin no// de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos rnams ma yin no// 
174b6(khri brgyad): du mig gi khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa ni me ga ki khams ma yin no// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig ken
174b7(khri brgyad): pAr shes pa'i khams ma yin no// de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma
174b8(khri brgyad): yin no// de bzhin du lnga'i khams dang / tshul khams dang / lnga'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / kye'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus
175a1(khri brgyad): / kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kha
175a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol gang yin pa don/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// de bzhin du ma rig pa'i pha rol ga yin pa ni/ ma rig pa ma yin no// de bzhin du lar te/ 
175a3(khri brgyad): bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no// de bzhin du skya
175a4(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o
175a5(khri brgyad): rol gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gyi bar kyi pha rol gang yin pa de dag nas
175a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcob rgyad ma yin no// de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang / las kyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ros gang
175a7(khri brgyad): pade ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// rab 'byor chos 'di dag gi pha rol ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de lta bu yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
175a8(khri brgyad): te chos 'di dag gi pha rol di lta bar chos thams cad kyang de lta bu la gsar/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltan ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon
175b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma 'gyur ma lags sam/ daci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'don gzugasas// 'dan char ba'o// 'di ni 'du shes so// 'di dag ni
175b2(khri brgyad): byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o// de bzhin du skar te/ 'di na rnam par thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi bar du yin no snyam du gzugs kyi phar lan rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis
175b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du mi dang / 'du shes kyi pharol dang / 'du byed rnams kyi pha rol dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa che yang ma mchis/ 
175b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar kyi pha rol na/ rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ji skad smras
175b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin no// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin po chos 'di dag 'di ltar zhi ba 'di ltar zab pa la nges par sems kyang zhum par mi 'gyur
175b6(khri brgyad): de ga skyem du ga nag gis chos didas mngan rdzogs pa #/ de ltar bdag ca blan medapaya dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas na
175b7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar zab pa'i chos 'di dag sems can rnams la bstan par bya'o snyam du sems pa ste/ rab 'byor de sa ngan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka 'jig rten rnams kyi
175b8(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga 'jig rten rnams kyi gling yin na/ rab 'byor 'di ma ste dper na chu klung dag gas/ mtsho'am/ mtsho chen po dag
176a1(khri brgyad): gam/ rgya mtsha ga gis phyogs 'di dag chus kun tu tshong pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gling zhes bya'o// rab 'phyos de bzhin du gzugs sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mar
176a2(khri brgyad): yongs su chad pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du
176a3(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na
176a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / 
176a5(khri brgyad): yongs su chad pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis pa kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor ljon
176a6(khri brgyad): mtha' dang / khyim ma chos yongs su tha pa sa chom thams cad chos su dpa yin no// sa bye tshas thams cad ldan tsamatha dang / khyi ma'i mthal yongs su can paka
176a7(khri brgyad): bde ni nib kyarnam pa sa ba bzhin yin te/ 'dis ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / yam yongs sunanas nga/ sbed pa zang pa dang / lcags ma lus pad / 
176a8(khri brgyad): dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de myar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched 'od ka 'ang garten rnams kyi gleng yin non/ rab 'byor de rjer
176b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da// 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa dang / 'od byed pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dag gis de dag gi dod de/ 'on la de kho nar rtogs nas de kho na bzhin du
176b2(khri brgyad): cing / sems can rnams la yang sngon lnga/ sems can rnams kyang de yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzung la ba 'god par byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar da byang chub sems dpa' sems
176b3(khri brgyad): chen po dga'ajig rten rnams kyi sngon ma 'dzin pa dang / 'od byed pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang / yos su 'a
176b4(khri brgyad): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa 'gro ba ngan pa'i 'gro ba par gro ba dag la/ sems can rnams rnam par dag par bya bar
176b5(khri brgyad): mya ngan dang / gnod pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dag/ nub par bya ba dang / rigs pa'i chos rtogs par bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba mngon su
176b6(khri brgyad): dubya ba'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ston par byed do// de bzhin du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs skyes med pa dang / 'gas
176b7(khri brgyad): dpa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rna pa par shes pa skye
176b8(khri brgyad): med pa dang / kur da son mong ma med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par sems ca
177a1(khri brgyad): dang / phyer mi 'o ba'i 'grus bu dang / dkyabacoms nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cadas khyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mong
177a2(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dben dang / yongs su
177a3(khri brgyad): 'dren pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
177a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/ byin pa dang / snyan par zla ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas sems can rnams bsdus nas sems
177a5(khri brgyad): can de dag nyid la gzugs nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
177a6(khri brgyad): de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to// gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs de stong pa nyidang / de ni gang nas kyi
177a7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba med la/ gang du yang 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa
177a8(khri brgyad): ni stong ba nyid de de ni gnas kyang 'ong ba med pa gang dul 'grob med par sems can rnams mtshamatshan to// de bzhin du gyur te/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pams cad mtshan pa nad
177b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid de/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la/ gang du yang 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten
177b2(khri brgyad): kye rten yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma meng pa dang / smon pa med pa pa tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag kyang tshul de las
177b3(khri brgyad): 'da' ba'i phyir ro// daci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med padag lda ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ci mang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos tham
177b4(khri brgyad): demangon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pod dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / purA nas
177b5(khri brgyad): longs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar kong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gagapa
177b6(khri brgyad): med pa dang / kun nas nyin mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dadag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor skye ba mad
177b7(khri brgyad): dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dkal shA gro ba 'am/ 'od bci yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgyu ma dang / 
177b8(khri brgyad): nga/ ma nga / mag pa dang / zag mas/ sprum pa'i tshulalas// ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag kyang dum de mas me dang// 
178a1(khri brgyad): mthams cad ni med pad/ brdzun ma pa'i / nga rnab sem pa mas ma chen pa dang/ byang tshul de las me 'da'o//  ra can/ 
178a2(khri brgyad): med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'od ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can te/ 
178a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba'am/ nga bci yang me dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du
178a4(khri brgyad): bya te/ chos thams cad ni blang du med pa dang / don du med pa'i bar gyi tshul can ta/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las me 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
178a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor blang du med pa dang / dor du med pa la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'bri ba med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa'
178a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dra ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ci yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad
178a7(khri brgyad): ni bdag med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de dag kyang tshul de las mi'anga'o// de ci'i phyib nen/ rab 'byor ba dag la ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong bcim
178b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar na gong ma bzhin du sbyang te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa dang / skye ba po med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang
178b2(khri brgyad): gang zag med pa dang / shed las skyes pa med pa dang / shid bu med pa dang / slong med pa dang / kun nas slong ba po med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang
178b3(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang / mthong sa po med pa'i chub can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kya tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag gtan
178b4(khri brgyad): med cing mi migs pa dang / de bzhin du sems can dang / srog da/ gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas spong
178b5(khri brgyad): po dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa' tshul
178b6(khri brgyad): pa 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni bde pa'i tshul can dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshul can dang / bdag gi chub can dang / bdag med pa'i tshul can dang / snang ba'i tshul nan dang / mi ste
178b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul can dang / mtshan ma'i tshul cad dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can dang / smon pa'i tshul dang / smon pa med pa'i tshul can dang / 
179a1(khri brgyad): tshul can dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul can dang / sdug pa'i tshul can dang / mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
179a2(khri brgyad): rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / sdug pa'i bar du gtan med cing me migs te/ de'i phyir de dag 'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ang lcag la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ches thams
179a3(khri brgyad): cad ni 'dod chags kyi gzhi can dang / zhe sdang gi/ zhi can dang / gti mug gi gzhi can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi gzhi dang / 
179a4(khri brgyad): sdang gi gzhi dang / gti mug gi gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs nas/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lha ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i
179a5(khri brgyad): gzhi can te/ tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lta ba'i rnam pa zhi tan med cing me migs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lhag pa yod pa'i
179a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams nAd ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can dang / ches kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can da / 
179a7(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
179a8(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag ki' tho ba 'am/ 'ong la ltag la yod pa'i phyir ro// 
179b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i tshul ldan te/ tshul de las ma 'da'o// da \u0f7f'i kyi zhe na/ rab 'byor gang ragro ba 'am/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i g.yob nyid gang yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab
179b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad de gzugs kyi tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba'i tshul can dang / 'du shes kyi tshul can dang / 'du byed kyi tshul can dang / rnam par nas
179b3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs med cing mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
179b4(khri brgyad): shes pa med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'od ba lug la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i tshul canate/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// 
179b5(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhag la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos tham sa nAd ni yul khrims kyi tshul can dang / 
179b6(khri brgyad): tshul can dang / brtson 'grus kyi tshul can dang / bsam gtad kyi tshul can dang / shes rab kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'di'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshul khrims dang / bzod
179b7(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
179b8(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes pa kyi phyin pa lag sa yod pa'i byer // rab 'byor de bzhin du ma thams cad ni nang na
180a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang slong pa nyid gtan med cing me dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba
180a2(khri brgyad): la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du rgyas thams nA~M thA rna la ldan dang / na du nga ba nyid sa nyid lats+tsha te/ tshu lu
180a3(khri brgyad): 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos tshe med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lhag la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab
180a4(khri brgyad): thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi tshu can te/ tshul de las mi 'ad
180a5(khri brgyad): deci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lhag la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin
180a6(khri brgyad): thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du ltung hU~M/ sa thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chol ma 'dres pa 'ico brgyad kyi bar gyi tshul can / 
180a7(khri brgyad): de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba wA ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// 8
180a8(khri brgyad): chos thams cad de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni lan cig phye 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / mi rong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
180b1(khri brgyad): com pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gtan med cing mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du ldan
180b2(khri brgyad): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rangs sa rgyas nyid med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lug la yod pa'i phyir ro// 
180b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag
180b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces 'ga' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
180b5(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab mo 'di la su dag mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan
180b6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon than me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad pa dag dang / sngon gyi yang dag
180b7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bo ni padag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zag
180b8(khri brgyad): 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mol par 'gyur ro// gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
181a1(khri brgyad): pa mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid de ci 'dra ba zhig du 'gyur gas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
181a2(khri brgyad): gi rtags ni ci 'dra ba zhig lakA sa/ mtshan ma ni ci 'dra bzhig/ dbyings ni na 'dra na ni lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
181a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag sa sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug du
181a4(khri brgyad): payin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni la
181a5(khri brgyad): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rtags dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kyi dben pa dag tu 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181a6(khri brgyad): po gang dag/ shes rab lnga pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dgA ji lta bu'i tshul can du 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
181a7(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni thams cad mkhyen
181a8(khri brgyad): nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'di lu ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su
181b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa ma mchis pa sgom padag ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur lags so// 'atsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams
181b2(khri brgyad): cad rnam par 'jig par lags la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chosathams cad rnam par 'jig pa yang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 
181b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ltas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad gang dag rnam par 'jig pa yin/ gsol pa/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa
181b4(khri brgyad): nga/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dang / khams bco brgyad rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de
181b5(khri brgyad): ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bdag dang / sems can dang / sleb po dang / srog dang / gas pa dang // nga bag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byad du 'jug
181b6(khri brgyad): dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed papo dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
181b7(khri brgyad): sgom pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
181b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i
182a1(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam 'ang 'dig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ngan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag pa' spong ba
182a2(khri brgyad): / dang nga/  kyilan nga/ ma mapar 'jig lags na // 
182a3(khri brgyad): bde ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
182a4(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phrer mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di sa sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
182a5(khri brgyad): sgo pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rtsa na so// bcom ldan 'das sa bka' stsal pa/ dab 'thod de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 'de na rtse/ 
182a6(khri brgyad): dpa 'i pha rol su smin pa bsgos par dag zugs nas par 'dug pa'o// de bzhi du 'dig / la yi la sbyin smos pa de sa tshor ba dang / 'du gas dang / 'du byed nams dag
182a7(khri brgyad): shes rnam par 'jig pa yin to// 'di sa pa/ sa shA kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mig rnam par 'jig payin no// de bzhin du 'di lta pe/ sa rab kyi 'dom tu phyin pa bsgos pad
182a8(khri brgyad): sA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'dis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni// gzugs rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du
182b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi 'os tu zin pa bsgom 'a ng+ge ni swA dang / dri dang / ro dang / rag pa dang / chos rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mig gi khams
182b2(khri brgyad): rnamapar 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs kyi khams dang / mag gi rnam shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'dres ste/ 
182b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i kham pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
182b4(khri brgyad): de ni/ sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sA'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams
182b5(khri brgyad): dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu ldan pa bsgos pa de ni/ lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
182b6(khri brgyad): pA'i khams rnam par 'jug pa yin no// 'di wA Te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa
182b7(khri brgyad): yin no// 'di las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de na
182b8(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag bcad pa'i bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu rnam par 'jig
183a1(khri brgyad): yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 
183a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du 'di la'o// shes rab kyi pha ro las zin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam ci rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de nas bcom
183a3(khri brgyad): 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
183a4(khri brgyad): na pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes par kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du snga
183a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las byar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas nye bar brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' semasna dpa' chen po la la ni shes pa
183a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par len par mi byed do// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
183a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// de bzhin sa te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
183a8(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/ gzhan gyis
183b1(khri brgyad): tshi ga dka la srung po med pa dang / de kho na ma yin par yang du chud par byed de/ gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro'o// 'dod chags dang / nA sdang dang / gti mug dang / mtshungs par ldan pa
183b2(khri brgyad): sems dang / sems las byung ba'i nye ba'i ton mongs pa rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro// na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po lel ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'ang
183b3(khri brgyad): yod pa na sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gta
183b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
183b5(khri brgyad): zel ro gzin pa bab mo 'di nyid thos nas mi skrag mi dang ning dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ mi zhum mi 'gyod ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yid ci la
183b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za' mnyan par mngon par dga' zhing / thos nas kyang 'dzin par zad/ 'chang bar byed/ kun chub par byed pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yad
183b7(khri brgyad): da pa'i bar du byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsru bar byed pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da
183b8(khri brgyad): can po ngas ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol la byin bza' mo 'di mos shing yongs su breb byas pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun chub par byas pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i/ 
184a1(khri brgyad): babadu thas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir de na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes ral kyi pha rol tu phyin paza' mo 'di 'chang ba na/ sa
184a2(khri brgyad): dang zheng dang bar mi 'gyur la/ mthum mi 'god ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las de'i yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyung ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu can pa/ 
184a3(khri brgyad): ba mo 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ kun chub par byed pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
184a4(khri brgyad): rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bab mo 'di 'chang ba nA mi sgeg mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ 
184a5(khri brgyad): zhum mi 'gong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang yid phyir ldos par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dzin par bgyid pa nas/ 
184a6(khri brgyad): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ji ltar spyad par bkri lags/ bcom ldan
184a7(khri brgyad): das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi chung sdes spang bar bya'o// gsol pa/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzhol ye
184a8(khri brgyad): sems kyi rlung kyis smad par bkyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems ce drud dang / de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
184b1(khri brgyad): la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o// de bzhin du nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / ku na na
184b2(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / num par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi drud dang / de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi drud dang / de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gno
184b3(khri brgyad): dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba dang / chos mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i
184b4(khri brgyad): sems kyi slad dang / de bzhin du snya ma dang / smig cu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / sprul ba la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyim shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa za
184b5(khri brgyad): 'di la sbyang pa sa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'thor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/ 
184b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi skad kyis shes rab rje pha rol tu phyin pa pab mo 'di la spong ba dang / de bzhin du
184b7(khri brgyad): sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / thag cha dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab mo 'di la spyod na
184b8(khri brgyad): bcu pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' semamadapa' chen po de gzugs pa spyod pa lags sam/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du sheb dang / 'du byed rnam pa dang / nam pas
185a1(khri brgyad): ba la spyod 'a lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mthem pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal pa/ rab 'argya
185a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spod pa ni gzugs la spyod pa ma yin no// tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / na
185a3(khri brgyad): par shes pa la spyod pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni rnam pa thams
185a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa ma yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni sus kyang ma byas/ 'gyur bar yang mthus/ gang nas kyang ma 'ong sa/ gang du yang ma song
185a5(khri brgyad): lang mi kanaH/ stsal na yang mi gnas/ phyogs na yang mi gnas te/ de la ni zang pa dang / nga mi gnas mi dmigs so// ga la zangs dang / rtsis me dmigs pa don
185a6(khri brgyad): kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs sa mtsho ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sa/ 
185a7(khri brgyad): 'bod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan dag gam/ shes rab 'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par
185a8(khri brgyad): 'tshang rgyabang mi nub po// de rtsem gying nas/ gsunas nyid rnam thathams cad babyen pa nyid yi brjid pa nin du thong ba dang / de bzhin du 'jugs dang / de bzhin du 'du byed nabs dang
185b1(khri brgyad): bzhin du rna mA pa shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid ldan pa pharar// de cil phyi zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa 'ams cad ma
185b2(khri brgyad): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
185b3(khri brgyad): dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcob kyad kyi bar gyi de ba
185b4(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ra gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
185b5(khri brgyad): de ba dang / lAm gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gAcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye
185b6(khri brgyad): las bsgom pa'i lde'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gnyis 'ardzogs so// / de nas 'dod pa na spong ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dag gis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang / rgya spos dang / 
185b7(khri brgyad): pa dag dang / lha'i mud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku su ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs du dong ste lhags
185b8(khri brgyad): das bcos ldan 'das rtsig papal chag po ma thag 'tsha ni/ byo na theg tu med do// cags gcig tu la bad ras pas te drid gshes brtse rngan 'das la di skad ces g.yel pa/ 
186a1(khri brgyad): ni bzhib yo btags pa'i mkhas pa dang / shes pas rig par bgyi ba lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgya
186a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags te/ 'di ltar gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams
186a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen panyid gzugs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
186a4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa ste// zugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 8
186a5(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gtsi
186a6(khri brgyad): nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis sud dazer ma mchis so// 'di ltar mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig lags so// de can
186a7(khri brgyad): dran pa dang / snga dang / lde dang / yum dang / yid nyid nas 'a thams cad ma tshan pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid lags te/ mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags
186b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de bzhin du na pa dang / sna dang / 
186b2(khri brgyad): sde dang / lum dang / yid ci de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing ga
186b3(khri brgyad): dbyer ma mchis so// 'di ltar gzugs rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs rnams lags so// de bzhin du s+tha dang / dri dang/ 
186b4(khri brgyad): dang / reg za dang / chos rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid cho rnams lags so// 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang la
186b5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de bzhin du mig gi khams nyid
186b6(khri brgyad): pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mther ba nyid mig gi/ khams lags te/ smig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
186b7(khri brgyad): gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// 'di ltar gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / 
186b8(khri brgyad): mas dang / sgra'i khams dang / na ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par
187a1(khri brgyad): she pa'i khams dang / lum sde khams dang / ga rgyal khams dang / lum gyi rnam par shes pa 'i khamam su med kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid rnam
187a2(khri brgyad): zhes pa'i khams nyid rnal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lags te/ de lta dran yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
187a3(khri brgyad): khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis
187a4(khri brgyad): byer ma mchis so// de bzhin du 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
187a5(khri brgyad): lags so// de bzhin su yang dan pa'i slong bag lags pa dag dang / rdzu 'phrul pa rkang pa rnams dang / dab rirnam pa dang / slobs rnam dang / snang chub kyi yin pag rnams dang / 
187a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du b+hA te/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phags pa'i kha pa yAr lag+sa
187a7(khri brgyad): pa lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni
187a8(khri brgyad): nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i slobs bcug bdag lags pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma thar ba nyid lags / 
187b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa rnams ca mtshan pa nyid ka nyid nga bzhin de na su/ nga ldas ma
187b2(khri brgyad): nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcigs nyid de/ gnyis sum mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de na
187b3(khri brgyad): sol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi wA de dkal 'di skad rjes bka' stsal to// lha dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ gzums nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
187b4(khri brgyad): la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa tham
187b5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin te/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
187b6(khri brgyad): debazhin nyid ni ga cig pa nyid pa cing gnyis na bya med do// de bzhin ma 'dang / 'gas dang / 'du byed rnams dang / mus shes pa de bzhin nyid ka
187b7(khri brgyad): bAdang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su med cing gnyis bu dper med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ @#
187b8(khri brgyad): choms rnam pa co tshad kyi ra zhin nyi ni de ga lapa da kyi bzhin ci ga me pa di bzhi de nyid
188a1(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med do// lha dag don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs de thugs kyi zin las chung ngal gzhol bar mdza
188a2(khri brgyad): chos ston pa la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phre she nA/ wA dag she mchos 'di ni zab ste/ mthong bar dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag par mi nus pa/ shib mo btags pa'i ma
188a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig par zla ba yin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'dir sangangasas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa de ni 'jig rten
188a4(khri brgyad): cad dang mi mthun pa yin te/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par ma sa ma rgyas/ kang las kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ gang du yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs
188a5(khri brgyad): lha dag 'di ni gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba yang med pa'i chos rnams kyi za pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dag nam mkha' za' ba nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po// lha dag de bzhin du
188a6(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid bab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rang ba nyid kyi phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 
188a7(khri brgyad): yas shing mthar thug pa med pa za pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'tho ba med pa bral ba nyid kyi phyir dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ 
188a8(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par byang ba med bza' pa nyid kyi phyi chos 'di bas so// ltung pa de la zhim du 'dag pa' la nyid kyi phyir dang / shes 'a po dang mamathong la po'i bar du zab pa nyid kyi cho sa 'di sa
188b1(khri brgyad): 'a sa s+ho//  de zhin du da ga sa nyi ma pa ga/ 2 shA/ rnanas
188b2(khri brgyad): ga dag bzhin du dang / nga ro dang/  dang/ rnams 'di /  bzhin du mig gi ma
188b3(khri brgyad): dang / mig ni rnam pa shes pa'i khams pa'ang nyid kyi chos 'di'ang// rna pa'i khams dang / sbrul khams dang / na rnam par shes khams rapapa nyid kyi
188b4(khri brgyad): rab bo// lha kA bzhin du rje'i khams dang / dri'i kham pa dang / tsA'i rnam par shes pa'i khams pa' pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di bas so// rnang med pazhin du rtse 'i khams drung/ rdo la mam
188b5(khri brgyad): gas pa 'i mas pa nyid kyikyi chos 'di ga 'o// 9 gas nga/  shAm+b+hi rnams du / snya pa sa se mam tham sa kyi cho
188b6(khri brgyad): dag yid kyi khams dang / chod kyi khams dang / yid mi nas par shes pa'i khams papa pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'deba'abo// sgra dag de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol su can bas nyid kyi kyi
188b7(khri brgyad): khrims kyi 'a rol byed pa dang / bad pa can pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi la kyi man kyi mamakhye pa dang / shesas kyi mo la phyin
189a1(khri brgyad): kye phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha dgang bzhin du nang stong pa nyid 'a'ang nyin pa phyin napa lnga tshu ba nyid dang / phyi nang rtso pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong ba nyid du
189a2(khri brgyad): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa spong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas song ba nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong la nyid dang / mtha' las 'das bslong ba nyid dang / thos ma dang tha ma med
189a3(khri brgyad): nyid dang / dor ba med pa spong ba nyid dang / rang bzhin spong ba nyid dang / chos thams cad song ba nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid dang / dngos
189a4(khri brgyad): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid za' ba nyid kyi phyir chos 'di tha' bo// lha dag de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir
189a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba zab pa nyid
189a6(khri brgyad): dzas 'i zab po// lha da ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob sa bcu bab pa nyid kyi sde chos 'di za' bo// lha dag de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du
189a7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du za' ba nyid kyi kyi chos 'di gal 'o// du ska ches bka' stsal pa dang / lha dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
189a8(khri brgyad): gapal to// tsa ma bcom ldan 'das kyil 'jig rten tham ma car rang mi mthun pa'i chos 'di 'dun chu ci'i dra du zhen/ btsun pa 'acom ldan 'das tshem 'di ni gzugs sa
189b1(khri brgyad): 'am/ me gzung bar brtse ba'i srad du bzhan pa ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byen rnams dang / rnam par shepa pa dazung ba 'am/ ma gzung bar brtsi ba'i sad du bstan
189b2(khri brgyad): lags/ de bzhin du mi gzung ba'am/ me gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar ba
189b3(khri brgyad): skad du bstan pa la lags/ gzugs rnams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar 'ardzi ba'i slad du bstan pa mi ldan sa/ de bzhin dra mA dang / dri dang / lo dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams
189b4(khri brgyad): 2ma/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bskrun pa ma lags/ de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang mim yi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar
189b5(khri brgyad): slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce'i khams
189b6(khri brgyad): nga'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung ba 'artse ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags// lam ste khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
189b7(khri brgyad): khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags// yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi rnams dang / yid kyi rnal par shes pa'i khams ku zung ba 'am/ mi gzung ba
189b8(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du bstan las lags/ de bzhin du sbyin pa 'i pha rol tu gyi la 'bu' la'am/ mi gzung yang 'chi ba'i srad du bstan pa ma / tshul khrims kyis rol ta can pa dang / bzod pa'i
190a1(khri brgyad): rol tu byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam ga tan nI pha la tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi 'arol tu phyin pa gzung bya 'am/ megazung bya
190a2(khri brgyad): slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du nang spong pa tid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung ba rab kyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
190a3(khri brgyad): dadang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas spyong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med
190a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang / dngos po med la sto pa nyid dang / 
190a5(khri brgyad): nga ba nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar 'ardzi la'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba 'am/ 
190a6(khri brgyad): zung ba bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lamakhan
190a7(khri brgyad): laka brgyad pa gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bkyi ba'i srad du ba
190a8(khri brgyad): pa ma lags/ de bzhin du myur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la cobargyad kyi bar du gzung la'am/ mi gzung ba rab kyi ba'i srad du bstan pa ma lags pa'i srad du'o// 'atsun
190b1(khri brgyad): com ldan 'das de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras gu/ zung ba 'am/ me gzung ba ba ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
190b2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
190b3(khri brgyad): da ni 'dag gzugs so// de bzhin du bdag tshor ba'o// bdag 'du shes so// bdag 'du byed rnams so// bdag gi 'du byed rnams so// bdag rnam par shes pa'o// de bzhin du bdag ni
190b4(khri brgyad): dag gi mig go// bdakan pa'o// bdag gi nu ba'o// sna dang / wA dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin du bdag cag de gzugs rnams so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg tu
190b5(khri brgyad): kya de bzhin no// bdug cag chos rnams lo// bdag cig gi chos rnams so// mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no// 
190b6(khri brgyad): bzhin du dkun pa'i khams dang / sku'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / snga'i/ khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / 
190b7(khri brgyad): khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / 
190b8(khri brgyad): khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// de bzhin du bdag sbyin pa'i pha ril phyin pa'o// bdag gi sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
191a1(khri brgyad): lha'i rnam par shes pa 'i khams mazung ba 'am/ me/ rlung ba bya ba'i phyir bstan 'am yan/  / khams dang ran b+ha'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam pa shes
191a2(khri brgyad): khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir
191a3(khri brgyad): bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bAs mag
191a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba 'am/ migazung bar bya ba'i phyi ba bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / gyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / 
191a5(khri brgyad): rapa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
191a6(khri brgyad): med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
191a7(khri brgyad): gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du yang
191a8(khri brgyad): spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dpa ga rna
191b1(khri brgyad): 'am/ mig zung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am/ miganang bar bya ba'i phyir bskrun pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sang
191b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kya bar dag nang ba 'im/ mig zung bar bya ba'i phyir ba sman gyis sbyin nung / s+yAd gi chos 'di na sbyin du zhugs pa'i 'bras thu gzung ba'am/ 
191b3(khri brgyad): gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub gzung ba 'am/ 
191b4(khri brgyad): gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin na/ lha dag gang
191b5(khri brgyad): bag gang dag gzugs gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am/ 
191b6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyinapa
191b7(khri brgyad): dang / bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// de bzhin/ 
191b8(khri brgyad): du mig gzung ba'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du na bdag sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am/ spang bar bya ba la byer skyed pa dang / de zhin du
192a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
192a2(khri brgyad): ba'o// bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du bdag gi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / khyi nang stong ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
192a3(khri brgyad): ba nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / thod ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du
192a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdaka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bad
192a5(khri brgyad): gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// de bzhin du bdag cag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bad cag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// de bzhin du bang
192a6(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis dpe rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag cag 'phags pa'i lam yan
192a7(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'o// de bzhin du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos mya 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag go// de bzhin
192a8(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'a da
192b1(khri brgyad): bdag rang byang chub po// bdag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag ging 'dzin pa la spyod pa lags
192b2(khri brgyad): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha dag de
192b3(khri brgyad): bzhin te/ lha dag de de bzhin no// jid smras pa de bzhin te/ lha dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
192b4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du na
192b5(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba 'am/ migazung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin// gzugs rnams gzung ba 'am/ migazung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pam yin/ de bzhin du
192b6(khri brgyad): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yim de yizhin du mig gi khamamA dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes
192b7(khri brgyad): khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ migazung bar bya
192b8(khri brgyad): phyir bstan pa ma yin/ sna'i khams dang / bri ba 'ams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams
193a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / 
193a2(khri brgyad): zhin du myig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khamasna dang / mig gin par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyad pa dang / de bsnyen dran pa khams
193a3(khri brgyad): smai'i khams dang / na ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rtswa'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams
193a4(khri brgyad): dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / 
193a5(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/ srung bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
193a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa da // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dag/ 
193a7(khri brgyad): bzhin du na yod pa nyid dang / phyi dab nyid dang / na stong pa nyid dang / slong ba nyid sto nyid dang / chen mo stong ba snyed dang / don ngas pa stong pa nyid dang / 'du khrus nga
193a8(khri brgyad): dang / 'dus ste stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang
193b1(khri brgyad): dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ zang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzha
193b2(khri brgyad): rnams gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i song ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang pod dade/ stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
193b3(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am/ sang bar bya
193b4(khri brgyad): spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
193b5(khri brgyad): bsgom par mi nus/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par mi nus la/ de
193b6(khri brgyad): gis ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lhag brgyad pa bsgom par myi nus/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos
193b7(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus/ de dag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom bur mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom
193b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun 'bacom ldan 'das chos 'din chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags so// ji ltar na chos 'di chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags
194a1(khri brgyad): / shu/ 'dis di ra kyi rol tu phyin chung garnyan pa grags so// chos 'di ni bsam gtan sbyin pa dang bathun pa lags sa
194a2(khri brgyad): bzhin du chos 'di ni btsun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni bzod pa'i ba rlo tu min pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni tshul khrim
194a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun pa nas/ chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i
194a4(khri brgyad): destong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'thun pa nas/ chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang
194a5(khri brgyad): palags so// de bzhin du chos 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang 'thun pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos 'dri ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang
194a6(khri brgyad): baljags so// de bzhin du chos 'di ni kun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// de bzhin du chos 'di ni yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'ang
194a7(khri brgyad): phyi mI 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// 
194a8(khri brgyad): chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun la gas te/ chos 'di ni gang du yang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// ji ltar na thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na/ 
194b1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ gzugs la grags pa ma mchis pa lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byad rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhugs pa ma mchis pa lpags so// de bzhin
194b2(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid ci spyad du dang / de lazhin du chos gnas pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha dang / bas mgyes mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi slad du
194b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du stong pa nyid slad du dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
194b4(khri brgyad): nam par byang ba med pa ma ny+dza ma pa nyid kyi slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs
194b5(khri brgyad): dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / 
194b6(khri brgyad): sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba dmigs sul mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di skye'am mchis pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi gzhi dmi
194b7(khri brgyad): srom mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam
194b8(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi bzhi dmigs sus mchis pa'i gyad du/ chos 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzungs na skyed pa'i lhan
195a1(khri brgyad): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad rjes gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa
195a2(khri brgyad): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'brelapa
195a3(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du'o// de na pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha de drag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dag gang 'di skad du nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes
195a4(khri brgyad): zher ba la/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gang gi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin/ ci re shig gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid
195a5(khri brgyad): pa'i / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesas skyes pa yin / de don nyid de ni gang nas kyang na 'das / gling du sa ma song / de 'azhin du gnas btan da 'a brji bzhin
195a6(khri brgyad): dgang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang masong ste/ de ldan ni gnas ba tan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
195a7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin zhing / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
195a8(khri brgyad): dgang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid med pa yin te/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gang shegs pa'i rjes bu skyes
195b1(khri brgyad): de gA nas btan rab 'byor ci de bzhin nyid kyang de yin te/ de ltar na gnas btan rab 'byor de bzhin ga shegs pa'i rjeg su smras pa yin no// ji ltar du bzhin gshegs pa
195b2(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid gdul yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la yang rdzogs pa med de/ de bzhi rlog shegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
195b3(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid dag nyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin nyid de ni ma byas pa ste/ de ni nu ma yang du
195b4(khri brgyad): nyid ma yin pa ma yin no// gang gi phyir de rtag tu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i phyir de gnyis su med cing / gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin
195b5(khri brgyad): shegs pa'i rjes pa sa pa yin no// de lder de bsnyen gshegs pa'i de bzhin dir tha mi dang cing bye brag med la/ gnyis su med pa de ltar gnas btan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
195b6(khri brgyad): pa'i rjes su skyes pa yi do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na med la/ de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
195b7(khri brgyad): te/ de ltar rdeg nas brtan rab 'byor dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma
195b8(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba ma yin pa/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas btan ra
196a1(khri brgyad): da bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bu'o// 'das parda dang rgan nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
196a2(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid ni 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin pa/ de bzhin gu shegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni
196a3(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri basmin nyid ni dam+b+hir byung ba
196a4(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid yin te/ de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid da ni gnyis su med
196a5(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer mang ngo do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par she
196a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bdon nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis srung byer med do// de bzhin du bdag gi de bzhin nyid nas/ shes pa po
196a7(khri brgyad): mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha ro
196a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhim nyid dang / de bzhin
196b1(khri brgyad): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa da bzhim nyid dang / dngos po med 'ja nga nyid stong pa nyid kyi
196b2(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de ba ni du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
196b3(khri brgyad): da sbyin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis
196b4(khri brgyad): med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad
196b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ lha dag byang chub sems dpa'
196b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po dag gis de bzhin nyid ka du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i
196b7(khri brgyad): mtshan thob pa'i chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni 'di yin no// de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa chen po
196b8(khri brgyad): rnam pa drug tu 'phrul rab tu 'gram kun du rab tu 'phrul lo// ldag rab tu leg/ kun du rab tu rjen po g.yos rab tu g.yom/ kur durab tu g.yas so// shang kyonas mngon/ 
197a1(khri brgyad): phyogs dma'o// nub phyogs mtsham/ shar phyogs dma'o// byang phyogs mtshon/ lce phyogs dma'o// lho phyogs mthan/ b+hang phyogs dma'o// mtha' mngon/ 8
197a2(khri brgyad): dma'o// dbus dma' na/ mtha' mtho'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang / lha'i rgya spos dang / 
197a3(khri brgyad): tam la'i lo ma'i kye mngag dang / lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku su ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / gnas brtan rab
197a4(khri brgyad): la gtong / mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
197a5(khri brgyad): su skyes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so zhes smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dag de ltar
197a6(khri brgyad): gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes smram skyes// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma sros/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
197a7(khri brgyad): rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid pas gzhan gyi rjes su
197a8(khri brgyad): so// de bzhin du myur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam 'thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyin bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad ma
197b1(khri brgyad): pa nyid las gzhon gyi rjes su ma sngos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan rje rjes su ma skyesate/ 'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi
197b2(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid kyi rjes sum skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su m+b+ha skyes so// de tso'i phyir zhe na/ lha dag 'a
197b3(khri brgyad): ltar gang zhig rjes su ma skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan
197b4(khri brgyad): 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus 'di skad ces gsor to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas
197b5(khri brgyad): nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab lags te/ de la ni gzugs dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mi dmigs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam
197b6(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras ba de ban te/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni
197b7(khri brgyad): de ga zugs dang / gzugs kyi bzhin nyid mi dmigs so// de la ni ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shi tu'i de bzhin
197b8(khri brgyad): dmigs bo// de bzhin du srung / de la na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam 'thams cid mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma de'igs so// de ci'i phyi na
198a1(khri brgyad): ti'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la ni re shig gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lhag pa dmigs/ de bzhin du 'du shes dang / 'du
198a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ re shig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang mi
198a3(khri brgyad): dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lug la dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong wa nyis stong ni len pa myed par zag pa rnams
198a4(khri brgyad): las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// lha dang mi lnga stong gis ni ma skye ba'i chos la
198a5(khri brgyad): pa thob po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug cu ni len pa med par zag pa rnams la sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
198a6(khri brgyad): pashA ra da ti'i 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgyal bsnyen bkur byas shing / de tha
198a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa de dag thams cad la dbul ba dag phul te/ de dag las rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bskyed/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan dag pa
198a8(khri brgyad): mod kyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i
198b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes sna tshogs pa nyid dang / spyod pa tha dad pa nyid du gyur te/ de dag ni 'di lta ste/ 'di ni sbyin pa'o// de banan du smin padag dang / 'di ni slong ba'o// 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o// 'di
198b2(khri brgyad): ni sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag cag ni 'di lta tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// tshul thams ni 'di ltar bslang bar bya'o// debazhin du 'di ni bzod pa'o// 
198b3(khri brgyad): da bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag cag ni 'di ltar brtsen 'grus dang
198b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa'o// 'di ltar brtson 'grus 'di brtsam par bya'o// de bzhin du 'di dag ni bsam gtan no// bdag cag ni 'di ltar bsam gtan pa'o// 'di ltar bsam gtan 'di dag la
198b5(khri brgyad): mas par 'jug par bya'o snyam du de lta bu'i 'du shes can dag tu gyur te// de dag gis ni shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su
198b6(khri brgyad): yin par sbyin pa dag byin/ tshul khrims dag bslangs/ bzod pa dag bskyed/ brtson 'grus dag rtsaldag bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag gis ni 'du shes tha dad pa
198b7(khri brgyad): nyid med pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa mthob pas/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la
198b8(khri brgyad): kun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob nas/ de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
199a1(khri brgyad): po'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid de yang yod/ mtshan ma med pa yang yod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa yang yod mod
199a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su
199a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du nywa
199a4(khri brgyad): sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
199a5(khri brgyad): zin cing / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su bgyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
199a6(khri brgyad): chen po ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom du bas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing / thabs la mkhas pa la
199a7(khri brgyad): brten te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // 
199a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i yul 'di skad ces bka' stsam to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la gang zag kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang thal
199b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs sum zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar spong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag sgom na/ nyan/ 
199b2(khri brgyad): thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang / shes
199b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la brten te/ snying rje chen po mngon sum du byas nas/ spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
199b4(khri brgyad): chos rnams snyoms/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dbye
199b5(khri brgyad): rnams kyi nang na mdab chags bya ma dab ma med pa lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig yod par gyur la/ de yang de nas 'dzam bu glang
199b6(khri brgyad): 'dir 'ong bar mams te/ tsaM 'das tha gling du gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ des bdag nyid mtshangs la bdug nyid batshungs pa'i 'og tu bar zhabs na/ de 'di sam du da ni bdage 'jam
199b7(khri brgyad): bu gling du ma lhung bar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du gnas pa byangango snyam du sems na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci bya ba rlab ma med pa des slar bdag kyi
199b8(khri brgyad): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du gzhag par nus rna ma'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'aka' stsal pa/ shA ra da ti'i bul
200a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs sum byin pa dang / thabs la mkha
200a2(khri brgyad): pa dang bral ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'di lnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad rnam pa thams cad/ 
200a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa bskyed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa de
200a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul
